Bakaba nibajuna amagara g'abantu

Bariyo nibatuura omu magara marungi .

Aha biragiro kuruga ahaiguru , akakiiko ka disiturikiti kakaba kaine okutegyeka embeera .
Tukagyezaho kureeba ngu ebintu byakorwa omu muringo oguhikire .

Tukaba twine kurekura esente kukora enshonga yaayo .
Esente zikaba ziine kukoresibwa gye .
Haryabaho omupiira gw'omunywani ahagati ya tiimu ezi zombi .
Abashomesa bashemerire kusiimwa munonga ahabw'amaani agu bateiremu kutuhabura .
Nitusiima abashomesa baitu ahabw'ebiteekateeko by'obuhanguzi ebi barikutureetera obwo barikutuhwera kwega .
Enshohoza nyingi zishemerire kuteebwa omuby'obwegyese omu ihanga ryeitu .
Niwe mwegyesa orikukirayo oburungi ou nmanyire kuruga omu buto .
Aha kiro ky'abeegyesa bakaraburwa okukunda abeegi baabo nk'abaabo .
Abashomesa boona omu ishomero ryaitu bakaheebwa obubonero ahabw'okukora ebintu bisya .
Bashabirwe kuhiga abaana kwejumba omu mirimo y'omu kibiina .
Akeejumba omu mizaano yoona ey'aheeru .

Abahingi nibetenga enguuto nungi z'okutwara ebintu byabo omu butare .

Abahingi bakatunga okumanya aha itaka rirungi n'eribi .
Abantu b'omumatemba ga Uganda bongyeire okwejumba omuby'obuhingi .

Abahingi baine kutunguura obugaiga bw'itaka kubaasa kutunga amasharuura marungi .

Bakwataniise n'abahingi kubahwera kwega obwire bw'okukora okufuuhirira .
Omwani n'ekimwe aha birimwa ebikuru ebirikureeta sente omu Uganda .
Gavumenti za disiturikiti ziine kwikirizana aha kirungi aha byaro byazo
Abakozi ba Gavumenti nibakira kushaba kwongyerwa omushaara .
Okwongyezibwaho emishaara nikikira kureetaho okuhakana omu bantu .
Abashomesa bateire ebikwato byabo ahansi kuhisya obu omushoro gwabo gurayongyerwe .
Gavumenti eshemereire kwongyera aha mushaara gwa ba kansara b'ebyanga .
Okubura okuhikirizana omu ba kanso nikikwata aha bantu b‘ekyanga .
Ba kansara baine kwikirizana aha nkora y‘abantu ahabw‘ebyanga byabo .
Gavumenti eshemereire kwongyera aha sente eziteirweho omu mbarira za disiturikiti .
Abakazi tibarikujwekyerwa kwingana omu myanya y'obwebembezi .
Ensiiba za ba kansara ba disiturikiti ziteirweho kutunguura okuheereza .
Ba kansara nibarebwa nk'abakozi ba gavumenti abaine esente nkye .
Abeebembezi ba disiturikiti bashemereire kutaho enkora z‘eby‘entasya ezirikugasira ebyanga byabo .
Hariho amakuru agarikworeka oburi bwenguzi bwingyi omu gavumenti za disiturikiti .
Kampeyini z‘okwerinda aha nguuto zigyendereire kukyendeeza butandu aha nguuto .
Obubonero n'obumanyiso bw'enguuto nabyo nibihwera omu kukyendeeza butandu z'enguuto .
Omubaro muhango gwa butandu niguruga omu kuvuga kubi .
Okuraba omu nguuto za Zebra nikuhwera abeegi ba purayimare okuraba gye omu nguuto.
Buriijo oine orusa rw'okuvuga buri bwire obu orikuvuga
Aba Bodaboda nibabaasa kuhwera omu kampeyini z’okwerinda aha nguuto ahabw’okuba nizigyendera aha nguuto .
Abarikugyendesa ebigyere baine kumanyisibwa aha ngyenderwaho y'okwerinda aha nguuto kukyendeeza butandu .
Abavugi ba Bodaboda barikurabira omukigombe kyabo nibabaasa kutunga loan za capital .
Eby'okurabamu eby'entare biine kuguma nibisiigwa erangi bwanyima y'obwire bukye kubaasa kureebeka gye .
Abavugi ba bodaboda bashemereire kukwatanisa n'abarikukurira eby'enguuto kwenda kukyendeeza butandu aha nguuto .
Okwongyera kumanyisa abantu aha bukuumi bw‘enguuto nikyetengyesa omu byaro nk‘oku kirikukorwa omu bibuga
Abaine bodaboda z'abantu buntu nabo bashemereire kukuratira ebiragiro by'okwerinda aha nguuto .
Eby‘okwerinda aha nguuto nibibaasa n‘okutaho emirimo y‘okuboneza omu kyanga n‘okumanyisa abantu aha buyonjo .
Tushemereire kugura ebintu ebikozirwe omukicweka kyaitu kuhwera omukwombeka eby'entaasya yeitu ey'omukicweka .
Okwombeka ebishaayi by'emizaano eby'omurembe nikiija kuhwera omu kutunguura emirimo y'emizaano .
Abaana abari omu nkambi z'empungi bashemerire kutunga obwegyese nk'abaturagye ba buriijo .
Gavumenti eshemerire kuha abakozi b'omukicweka endagaano z'okuhangaho emirimo mingi omukicweka .
Enguuto nungi nizireetera okuhitsya obuhwezi aha mpungi kwanguha .
Empungi nyingi nizibonabona ahabw‘okubura eby‘okurya ebirikwingana .
Ebikwato by‘okwekyebera nibihwera omu kukyebera endwara juba omu byaro
Orutaro omuri South Sudan rureetsireho empungi nyingi omu Uganda .
Ebitongore by’ensi yoona nibikira kurugayo kuha empungi eby’okurya .
Gavumenti ekuratire ebyobwegyese bw'abaana empungi .
Abaana b’empungi bashemereire kutendekwa eby’okubaija n’eby’okushemeza kubaasa kutunga sente z’okubeisaho .
Amashomero gashemereire kutandika kwega aha intaneeti omubwire obu obw'endwara ruranda nsi
Abaana b'empungi nabo bashemerire kushomesa kugira ngu babaase kureeberera amaka gaabo .
Gavumenti eshemereire kutaho sente nyingi omu mbariirira y'empungi .
Obukugu bw'emikono n'omuringo gw'obwegyese mukuru aha mpungi .
Esente eziteirweho kuhwera abahikirweho ebihikiirizi tizishemereire kwiba ahakuba eki nikikwata aha ihanga .
Okukyebera omutindo nikuhamya ngu abeegi nibatunga obuheereza burungi bw'obwegyese
Okwongyera oburaaro bw'abashomesa nikihamya ngu abashomesa tibakyerererwa omu mashomero
Twena twine kwakiira empungi omu ihanga ryeitu .
Purojekiti z‘eby‘obuhingi n‘oburiisa z‘empungi nizireeba ngu ebyanga ebi hati nibibaasa kweriisa .
Ebyanga by‘empungi biine kukwatanisa n‘ebyanga ebirikubataayaayisa kwombeka enkoragana y‘abantu .
Ekitongore ky'eby'amagara nikibura abakozi ekirikureetaho omubaro muhango gw'abashaho n'abarwaire
Abashaho nibetenga oburaaro bwa busha nk'ekirikubahiga
Abashaho abarikushemeza abantu ni bakye munonga omu marwariro n'ahabw'ekyo nikireetaho okwetenga kwingi .
Okukyebera enguuto eziherize kwombekwa buri kaanya nikyetengyesa kureeba ngu zaaguma ziri aha mutindo .
Gavumenti eshemereire kukyendeeza aha kwewoza kandi ekozese esente ezirikuruga omu ihanga .
Abantu boona tibarikwesiga ebitongore ebirikukwaata aha mateeka .
Okuhiiga nikushiisha eby'oburambuzi ahabw'okuba ebika by'ebinyonyi nibiguma nibikyendeera .
Obutabanguko bw’ekigombe ky’abantu bushemerire kujumwa munonga ahabwokuba amagara g’omuntu otaine rubanja nigabaasa kufeerwa .
Abashuubuzi nibakira kwitwa ahabw'okutongana omu by'obushuubuzi .
Okuba omushubuzi wa Uganda nikisikiriza abazigu .
Hoteeri zishemereire kwongyera ahaby'okwerinda kurinda abagyenyi baazo
Abaitsi omuri Uganda batungire embundu omu muringo ogutarikwikirizibwa kandi bakoresa Bodaboda
Obutabanguko bw’ekigombe ky’abantu bureetsireho okufa kw’abantu abataine rubanja .
Ebiragiro nibigira ngu omuntu taine rubanja kuhitsya obu arahamirwe ngu aine orubanja .
Ebigombe by'abatemu nibikira kutunga embundu kuruga omu bakuumi omu muringo ogutari mu mateeka .
Zimwe embundu ezitungirwe omu muringo ogutari mu mateeka niziruga omu bashuma b'ente omu kicweka kya Karamoja
Obupooriisi bw'ekyanga ni bukuru omu kukyendeeza obuhenda biragiro .
Abantu tibashemerire kwejumba omubutabanguko bw'ekigombe kwonka beete poriisi kutwara obujunaanizibwa
Buriijo tambura na kaadi yaawe y'eihanga kubaasa kumanyisibwa gye
Okucondooza kwa poriisi nikukira kutwara obwire buraingwa n'ahabw'ekyo nikitusiga tutaine by'okugarukamu .
Obutaikirizana aha itaka bukira kurugamu okufa n'okubinga abantu omu maka gaabo .
Obwire obwingi Okushoroora omu nganda nikubaasa kureeta entaro kyaba kitateirwe omu bushoborozi .
Ab'obushoboorozi bashemerire kushoborora obutabanguko bw'eitaka kutangira obutabanguko
Empapura z‘eitaka nizihwera omuntu kworeka ngu eitaka eri aine niryo .
Ensharo ezirikworeka gye zishemereire kuteebwaho okuzibira okutaahirira eitaka .
Abeebembezi b’eby’obuhangwa bashemerire kuhabura ebyanga byabo kwejumba omu by’obuhingi eby’obushuubuzi .
Abantu baine kumanyisibwa aha bugabe bw'eitaka okwetantara obutabanguko aha itaka .
Abeebembezi b’eby’obuhangwa bashemereire kuburira obusingye n’obusingye omu byanga byabo .
Okutongana aha itaka nikurugamu okwebaganisamu omu bantu b‘omu maka .
Abeebembezi b'obuhangwa tibashemerire kureetaho okwebaganisamu omubyanga byabo
Ekitongore ky'eby'oburamuzi omuri Uganda kigambirweho oburi bw'enguzi bwingi .
Abeebembezi b'eby'obuhangwa baine kuhika aha kwikirizana okuzibira entaro z'enganda .
Obutaikirizana bw'enganda bushemereire kushobororwaho n'okugaaniira omu mwanya gw'obutabanguko .
Hariho okukozesa kubi esente omu bukiiko bw'ebyesente bwa disiturikiti .
Abakuru baingi omu kanso z'ebyanga bareebirwe nk'abarikwejumba omu nshonga z'obushomankuzi .
Gavumenti eshemereire kwongyera kukwaata oburi bwenguzi omu disiturikiti
Okucondooza kwa buriijo kushemerire kukorwa aharurengo rwa disiturikiti kumaraho oburi bwenguzi .
Aba kanso z'ebyanga abashangirwe baine omushango gw'obushomankuzi bashemerire kumara omukihome
Ensimbi z’emizaano nizikira kukoresibwa kubi n’ahabw’ekyo nizikwata aha kitongore eki
Hariho ebirikugambwaho obushuma omukitongore ky'okugura ebintu omu disiturikiti
Abakuru omu disiturikiti baine kuha obujunaanizibwa bw‘esente omu byanga byabo .
Ensimbi za disiturikiti nizibaasa kuhindurwa zite omu purojekiti z‘eby‘entasya ezigyendereire kwihaho obworo .
Ebintu by'abakuru abashomankuzi bishemereire kukwatwa kyaba kihamibwe ngu baine orubanja
Abakuru ba gavumenti abamwe nibajunaanwa ebishuba ngu nibakora enguzi n'ahabw'ekyo nibashiisha eiziina ryabo .
Okubura obuhame nikikira kubaho omu mishango y'obushomankuzi ahabw'okuba abakuru b'obushomankuzi nibashweka emihanda yaabo .
Emishango y'obushomankuzi enyingi neebinga omu kooti ahabw'okubura obuhame .
Ebitongore bishemerire kukozesa tekinologiya y'esente omu kurwanisa oburi bwenguzi .
Okuhiiga abafumu nikukira kubaho omu ofiisi za gavumenti ekirikubaasa kurugamu okugambirwa ebishuba .
Ekitongore ky'ebibira omu ihanga nikikira kujumwa ahabw'okukoresa kubi ebibira .
Abakuru bakamugambira eki aine kukora .
Abakuru bakaba batamwesiga .
Tihariho buhame oburikumara kucwera omutemu orubanja .
Akaba naakundwa abantu .
Hariho okutema ebibira kwingi omu kicweka eki .
Abantu omuri Adjumani batungire obukugu bw'okukora bizinesi .
Gavumenti ehereize abantu emirimo .
Disiturikiti neija kukwatanisa emirimo yoona eya purojekiti .
Purojekiti egi egyendereire kutunguura embeera y'eminyeeto .
Empungi tizirikwejumba omu mirimo y'obushuubuzi .
Abantu tibarikuhikaana n'obukugu bwabo omu bizinesi .
Emigisha ya purojekiti eshemerire kugabwa omu bantu boona .
Emigisha eshemerire kuheebwa abantu abo bonka abarikugikunda .
Empungi nazo niziija kutunga omugisha gw'okwejumba omu purojekiti egi .
Abantu bakwatsirwe ahabw'okuhenda ebiragiro .
Amahe gakareeba ngu eby'obuhangwa byarindwa kandi byarindwa .
Abantu baine kutunga obukomooko obundi obw'amajuta .
Abarikuhenda ebiragiro bari omu mikono ya poriisi .
Abantu boona ababaire nibatahirira ebibira bakwatsirwe .
Bavunanwa okuhenda ebiragiro by'ekibira .
Pooriisi ekwatsire ebyoma ebyabaire nibikoresibwa omu kutema emiti .
Gavumenti ekashohoza ebiragiro aha ku emirimo y'ebibira eshemerire kukorwa .
Gavumenti etwaire enkora y'okurinda ebika by'emiti ebitari bimwe na bimwe .
Abakuru omu disiturikiti ya Adjumani bazibiire okuguza amakara omu nteekateeka y'okurinda ebibira .
Abantu ba Adjumani nibetenga amaizi agagumire .
Abantu nibatwara eshaaha nyingi kutunga amaizi g'okukoresa omu maka .
Abantu nibetenga obuheereza bw'okujanjaaza amaizi .
Abantu ni baingi aha myanya y'amaizi ekirikukyendeeza aha bwingi obu barikubaasa kutunga .
Disiturikiti eshemerire kutaho ebiina bisya omumwanya .
Amaizi tigahikire kukozesebwa omu maka .
Empungi tiziine maizi g'okukoresa omu maka .
Abantu nibakozesa amaizi makye okurinda amagara gaabo .
Disiturikiti neteekateeka kutaho entuura nsya y'okutunga amaizi g'abantu .
Abeebembezi bashemerire kushaba sente kuruga omu minisiture y'amaizi kuhwera omu nshonga egi .
Abakuru ba disiturikiti nibakora kyona ekirikubaasika kukyebera embeera egi .
Abakuru ba disiturikiti baine kworobya abantu kutunga amaizi .
Enganzi akatebeekanisa okutandikaho ekiina kisya .
Disiturikiti neija kugarura empungi omu myanya erimu amaizi garikumara .
Abantu omuri Moyo batungire obukugu n'okumanya eby'obushuubuzi .
Abantu nibaija kubaasa kutandikaho n'okwejumba omu bizinesi .
Obukugu obu barikutunga nibwija kuhwera abantu kutunga sente .
Abantu batungire esente z'okubahwera kwejumba omu mirimo ya bizinesi .
Abantu nibaija kugira oburinzi bw'emirimo n'obushoboorozi bw'okureeberera amaka gaabo .
Abantu nibaija kutunga esente kandi batunguure embeera zaabo .
Disiturikiti neija kugumizamu neshagika emirimo y'abantu kwongyera aha mbeera yaabo .
Abantu bakamanyisibwa kukora n'amaani n'okutegyeka gye bizinesi zaabo .
Disiturikiti ziine obuheereza bubi bw'eby'amagara .
Abakuru ba disiturikiti baine kusiimwa ahabw'okurwanisa akafuba .
Abakuru bakakora omurimo murungi munonga .
Disiturikiti egi ekabaasa kukyebera n'okumaraho endwara egi , okutashushana na disiturikiti ezindi .
Adjumani aine abashaho abarungi kandi abaine obukugu omu by'amagara .
Disiturikiti nizetenga abakozi b'eby'amagara abaine obukugu kandi abaine obushoboorozi bw'okurwanisa akafuba .
Abakozi b'eby'amagara tibaine by'okwerinda n'ebintu byabo baaba nibajanjaba abarwaire .
Abakozi b'eby'amagara baine okumanya kukye aha ndwara y'akafuba .
Minisiture neyetenga kuha obuheereza bw'eby'amagara omu buri kyanga .
Disiturikiti neyetenga kuhiga abantu kukyeberwa omu kicweka eki .
Abantu tibarikwesiga ebyarugamu bya korona kuruga omukitongore eki .
Abantu nibagira ngu ebimwe aha byarugamu bikozirwe disiturikiti .
Bamwe aha bakuru ba disiturikiti bashangwa baine oburwaire bwa Coronavirus .
Minisiture eyorekire obugobya bwayo obu abaine oburwaire obu baashangwa bataine oburwaire obu omu bicweka ebindi .
Abantu abamwe nibaba baine oburwaire obu , reero bakateebwaho akamanyiso ngu baine oburwaire obu .
Ebirugire omu karuuru kuruga omu disiturikiti ya Arua biine ebibuuzo bingi .
Disiturikiti terikukuratira abantu abaine oburwaire obu omu disiturikiti .
Abantu nibabanganisa aha bigyezo ebi disiturikiti yashohoza .
Disiturikiti terikuha buhwezi bwona aha bantu abaine oburwaire obu aha disiturikiti .
Ebimwe ebyarugire omu karuuru aha disiturikiti bitahikire .
Ekitongore kya disiturikiti kishemerire kukuratira ebiragiro ebiteirweho .
Abakuru abamwe baremirwe kubugana purezidenti ahabw'ebirugire omu kucondooza kwa corona ebishuba .
Abamwe abesimbireho tibakasingirwe omu karuuru ka boona .
Eka egi ebaire neekora omu myanya etari emwe n'emwe omu mahe .
Ishe akaba ari omukuru wa Idi Amin .
Omunyeishengyero ogu akuriire aha nsharo ya Uganda .
Eka ye ekagaruka omu Uganda bwanyima y'okuhindura obutegyeki omu mwaka gwa ikumi na mwenda makumi kinaana na mukaaga .
Akashoma eishomero rye erya purayimare aha nshonda zoona .
Akaba ayehaireyo omu kushoma kwe .
Akaheza emishomo ye kuruga omu yunivasite ya Makerere .
Akaba aine ekihika ky'obwegyese .
Akatandika kuha abantu okumanya aha yunivasite y'abakristaayo eya Uganda .
Akatandikaho ekibiina ekirikukorera omu kicweka .
Akatunga omugisha gw'okukora omu murimo gwe .
Akaba ayehaireyo kandi ataire omutima aha mirimo ye omu kitongore .
Akaba aine ekyetengo ky'okujwekyera abantu omu kicweka kye .
Akataaha omuby'obutegyeki kandi yayesimbaho ​​ahabw'okutunga entebe y'eby'obutegyeki .
Yarahizibwa nk'omukazi omu ishengyero rya Disiturikiti .
Abantu bakaba nibateekateeka ngu nibaija kufeerwa baaba nibamuhakanisa .
Akaba omujwekyerwa wa paramenti ataine orikumuhakanisa .
Nayenda ngu abantu be bagire amagara marungi .
Nayetegyereza ebizibu by'abantu okukira omuntu weena .
Naamanya oku arikukoragana n'abantu n'ebizibu bitari bimwe na bimwe ebi barikutunga .
Ekigyendererwa kye n'okuta omutima aha mpinduka omu bantu arikugaita abantu aha migisha etari emwe n'emwe .
Naayenda ngu abantu batungye ebyetaago byabo .
Omuny'eishengyero ogu aine omukazi kandi aine eka .
Abantu omu kicweka eki beejumbire omu mirimo y'obuhingi .
Abahingi nibatunga embibo z'omutindo mubi .
Ebicweka makumi ataano ahari igana by'embibo ezirikuguzibwa omu katare ka Uganda n'ez'ebicupuri .
Abahingi baingi omu kicweka nikyo kimwe bakagura embibo z'ebishuba .
Omushomo ogu ogw'ebiro bibiri gutebeekanisiibwe kutendeka abahingi aha mbuto z'ebishuba .
Obugabe bw'abantu n'obugabe obwa buri omwe omunsi .
Twaba turi omu mirimo ya bizinesi tushemerire kuhaana ekitinisa .
Twine kukoragana n'abarikubaasa kukwatwaho .
Abahingi baine obugabe kwejumba omu kucwamu .
Kurabira omu kutendekwa , abahingi bakamanya obugabe bwabo .
Abahingi bashomesibwa aha mbuto z'ebishuba n'ebizibu byazo .
Abahingi bakaba batarikumanya ngu nabo baine obugabe bwabo .
Bamanyisiibwe ahu barikubaasa kutunga embibo z'omutindo murungi .
Abeebembezi ba disiturikiti beegyeise abahingi obugabe bwabo n'ebi baine kukuratira .
Kikongyera aha busobozi bwabo kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byabo omu muringo murungi kandi oguhikire .
Guruupu nyingi ziizire kwegyesa abahingi aha mbuto z'ebishuba eziri aha katare .
Enjuma z'ebishuba nizikwata aha bihingwa by'omu faamu .
Nibaguza abahingi embibo ezirikuraganisa ngu niziija kutunga ebiriisa bingi kwonka ziremwa kukura na kakye .
Enjuma z'ebishuba nizireetera eby'okurya bikye n'ahabw'ekyo abahingi nibaguma omu bworo .
Abakuru b'ebyaro bashabire abahingi obutabyara embibo .
Abakristaayo nibakoresa endwara y'omuze nk'okwekwatsa obutaha ekicweka kya ikumi .
Ni Ruhanga w’ebiro byona .
Purezidenti arangirire okwiguraho emyanya y'okuramizamu wiiki ehwaire .
Abashabire okujanjaza ekigambo kya Ruhanga omu nshonda zoona z'eihanga .
Ekanisa ekahwera enkumi n'enkumi z'abantu kutunga entuura y'amaizi erikugumizamu .
Omukazi w'omureeberezi akamanyisa eminyeeto purojekiti y'okutunga .
Enju y'omureeberezi eriyo neyombekwa .
Kenya yagaruka yaiguraho emyanya y'okuramizamu omu mbeera zigumire .
Ekitongore eki nikishomesa abantu aha kabi akari omu kutwara enda omu baana b'abaishiki bakiri bato .
Eminyeeto neekwatwa endwara z'obushambani .
Eminyeeto eshemerire kwetantara okweteeranira omu myanya erimu abantu baingi .
Haihi kimwe kya kataano ky'abaishiki abari omu myaka y'obushogoyo omuri Afirika nibatwara enda .
Omu kutwara enda juba , eminyeeto neetunga akabi k'okutunga oburemeezi omu kuzaara .
Omukazi omukuru akaha abaishiki bato obushoboorozi n'okumanya .
Nikirungi kutunga okwerinda okukira okuhunga .
Embaririra yoruzaaro ehwereire abaishiki okwetantara okutwara enda bakiri bato .
Okutwara enda omu myaka y'obushogoyo nikukira kuba ahagati y'emyaka ikumi n'eshatu kuhika ahari ikumi na mwenda .
Hariho emirundi mingi y'okushiisha ebiro ebi .
Eminyeeto neekira kuba eine enshoni z'okugamba aha magara gaabo g'okuteerana .
Hariho okutunguuka omu kutunga obuheereza bw'okureeberera abakaikuru/abagurusi abaine enda .
Abaishiki abato bari omu kabi k'amaani k'okutunga oburemeezi omu kuzaara .
Omu bwire bw'endwara ya Korona , emishango y'okutwara enda omu myaka y'obushogoyo ekeyongyera .
Abashaho abaine ebisaanyizo omu irwariro rikuru nibakira kukora aha kuzaara abaana .
Abaishiki nibaigura aha magara gaabo g'okuzaara ahabw'okuba nibahikirizibwa omwe ahari omwe .
Amakampuni nigaija kuba omu kabi k'okufeerwa emigisha gaabo gaaremwa kwehandikisa .
Orukiiko oru rwaba ruriho na za kampuni z'amajuta omu matemba ga Uganda .
Amakampuni g'omu burengyerwa-izooba nigayenda kukora n'abashuubuzi barungi .
Gavumenti eraganiise kureeta amaizi omu disiturikiti egyo ensya .
Amakampuni gahabuirwe kwehandikisa; ekindi , tibarikwija kutunga emigisha eriho .
Emigisha y'okutendekwa n'ey'abashuubuzi kwega oku barikubaasa kuhandikisa bizinesi zaabo .
Abeebembezi baine kushoborokyerwa aha nkora zaabo z'okurihiirira eitaka .
Nibaija kukoresa eminyeeto omu kicweka ekyo .
Bashemerire kuba nibabaasa kuha enkora nungi z'abakozi .
Abantu abarikuhikiiriza ebirikwetengyesa nibaija kuheebwa emirimo .
Kampuni emwe eyorekire ngu neeyenda kukora omuri Masaka .
Amakampuni g'amajuta nigayetenga kushoboorora ebiragiro byago byona omu ndimi z'omu kicweka .
Baaba nibagamba n'abantu , bashemerire kwegyendesereza aha rurimi oru barikukoresa .
Puroguraamu neija kutaho kampeyini y'okumanyisa abantu aha mukoro ogu .
Ekitongore eki kihaireyo ebipapura by'okushemeza abaishiki mushanju aba primary .
Baraganiise kuha abaishiki abari omu bibiina ebindi obupapura obundi amashomero gaheza kwigurwa .
Bakashagika abaana barikubaha ebikwato by'okwega .
Naija kushashura ebishare by'eishomero ahabw'abeegi abaine emitwarize mirungi .
Abashomesa batungire miriyooni ibiri z'okutunguura embeera zaabo omubwire bw'endwara ya Korona .
Eki nikikora omurimo muhango omu kwongyera aha kwehayo kw'abeegyesa aha mirimo .
Omukuru w'eishomero nawe naija kugasirwa omu purojekiti egi .
Ceyamaani w'ekyanga n'omwegi mukuru w'eishomero eryo .
Abashomesa boona nibaija kuheebwa ebiconco abeegi baaba batungire ebicweka by'okubanza .
Akaheebwa ekiconco ahabw'okukora gye omu by'obwegyese bw'eishomero .
Mwena mushemerire kukora munonga kubaasa kutunguuka omuby'obwegyese bwanyu .
Tihariho ishomero eririkubaasa kusingura hatariho abashomesa abaine obukugu .
Okutwara enda omu myaka y'obushogoyo n'ekintu kikuru ekirikuteganisa abaishiki omu by'obwegyese .
Omukingo gwareetera abaishiki kumara obwire bwingi n'aboojo n'abashaija .
Okwejumba kw'abazaire nikuhwera omu kutunguura emitwarize y'abeegi omu kibiina .
Abeegi aba ira ab'eishomero eri baheireyo ebikwato by'okwega .
Okuhayo kwizire omu bwire obu kurikwetengyesa .
Okuha abeegi ebikwato ebi nikiija kuhwera abeegi kutunga obwegyese bw'omutindo .
Mwebare kutuhwera kuba abazaire abaine okwehimbisa .
Okukora kubi kukaruga omu kubura kw'abeegyesa .
Okuriisa enjuki n'omuringo gw'okutunga sente z'abahingi .
Tibatungire kutendekwa okurikumara omuby'okuriisa enjuki .
Akaba naayenda kutunga okutendekwa kwingi omu by'okuriisa enjuki .
Okutendekwa kukahamya okukora omu kuhikaana n'obuhangwa .
Murumuna wangye agasiirwe munonga omu kukozesa omusiri gw'enjuki ogw'omurembe .
Bakeehayo ahabw'okuboneza omu kyanga kyabo .
Eminyeeto kuruga omu nkambi z'empungi eyejumbire munonga omu mirimo egi .
Obuki kuruga omu njuki bwine omugasho aha magara .
Tiimu zikateebwaho kuhwera omu kumanyisa abantu aha by'obuhingi n'oburiisa bw'enjuki omu kyanga .
Tikirikwetengyesa sente nyingi kutandika kuriisa enjuki .
Nibaija kutendekwa kumara obwire obumanyirwe .
Okubiika ebihandiiko ni kikuru omu kuhinga .
Nikiija kureetaho obusingye n'okwetegyerezana omu guruupu ibiri .
Okuhinga nakyo n'oburugo bw'esente aha mpungi .
Abakaikuru/abagurusi nibetenga obukugu bw'amagara goona kubaasa kwombeka eby'omumaisho birungi .
Nibahabura eminyeeto kuhinga emiti mingi .
Kampeyini y'okuhinga emiti neija kujanjaara omu bicweka bya disiturikiti etari emwe n'emwe .
Omu bwire bw'ekyererezi ebirimwa nibyomya .
Esente niziija kutwarwa omu akawunti ya banka ya guruupu .

Abakazi nibasiima okugaruza busya ekishengye ky'okuzaariramu .

Kikaba kiri eky'okuha ekitiinisa abakazi abarikufa ahabw'ebizibu omu bwire bw'okutwara enda n'okuzaara .
Abantu baingi n'ebitongore nibireka sente z'okuhwera abakyene .

Eirwariro niriyenda abashaho baingi .
Abakozi b'eby'amagara bashemerire kuyamba abarwaire .
Abakozi bakesharinga ahabw'enshonga z'emishaara .
Omushoro gwe gukeeyongyerwaho .
Abeegi bashemerire kukora munonga kutunga ebicweka birungi .
Omugyenyi w'ekitiinisa akaha orubazo orurikushemeza .
Buri omwe naahwera omu kutunguura ekyanga .
Enkora y'obwegyese neyetenga kutunguuka .
Kandi baganiire aha miringo y'okushoborora oburemeezi obu abaana b'amashomero barikutunga .
Twine kukora hamwe .
Minisita akatweta ngu tukwataniise kandi tukatuura omu busingye .
Okumanyisa abantu aha by'amagara g'abantu kuriyo nikukorwa .
Obutabanguko oburikureetwaho obuhangwa bw'abantu nibufubirwa .
Abaana baine kuhaburwa .
Abazaire tibashemerire kutwariza kubi abaana baabo .
Hariho obuhangwa bwingi omunsi .
Abaana bashemerire kumanyisibwa aha kabi akari omu kuteerana n'abashaija abandi .
Bashabirwe kuhayo ripooti .
Arua ehandiikire obuhenda biragiro bwingi okwezi oku .
Abaana bashemereire kuha abakuru baabo ekitinisa .
Obuzaire n'obujunaanizibwa bwingi .
Obushambani bushemerire kuzibirwa .
Hariho obutaikirizana bwingi omu maka .
Hakabaho butandu nyingi omu matemba ga Uganda okwezi okuhweire .
Bayoreka obutashemererwa kwabo .
Abantu bashemerire kumanyisibwa ahaby'okwerinda aha nguuto okwetantara butandu .
Butandu z'amaizi tizirikubaho munonga ebiro ebi .
Ekigyere kisya kyagurwa erizooba .
Abantu baingi nibakoresa ekigyere .
Bashabire ekishaayi ky'enyanja kukora engyendo ezindi .
Obukuumi bw'amaizi n'enshonga nkuru y'okugaaniiraho .
Ceyamaani agizire ngu butandu y'amaizi ebaireho erizooba .
Ekigyere kikaba kiijwire ebintu bingi .
Abarikukozesa entambura z'aha maizi baine kuheebwa ebijwaro by'okucungura amagara bingi .
Ekanisa ekahayo eby’okukoresa eby’okukiza amagara .
Abaana nabo nibetenga ebijwaro by'okukiza amagara .
Bakaba batiinire kukozesa entambura y'amaizi .
Abakozi abaine enguzi bakyemereziibwe .
Titwatunga sente zoona kuruga ahariwe .
Bakyemerezibwa kumara ameezi ashatu .
Oburi bwenguzi bukajumwa munonga .
Esente ezo zikaba zitwarwa .
Akaba aine okwerarikirira aha bukuumi bw'ekicweka .
Nibakora purojekiti y'okutunguura eby'okwerinda omu kicweka .
Abaturagye bashabire okugarukamu .
Purojekiti egi ekaba etarikureebererwa .
Abeetabiremu boona bakashabwa kuhandiika sente ezi batungire .
Abashuma tibashemerire kurekurwa kuruga omukihome .
Abeebembezi bakaba baine omushomo gw'okwombeka ekibiina .
Ensimbi zikaba zitarikumara kuheza purojekiti .
Bashabire okusaasirwa ahabw'okukoresa kubi obuhwezi obu babaire batungire .
Bashabirwe okugaruza sente ezi babaire batungire .
Titukatungire sente zoona kuruga omwaka oguhwaire .
Buri nshohoza ekahandiikwa .
Ogu akwatsirwe nyomwebazyo .
Okukora abaana nikufubirwa .
Abaana buzima nibakunda kuzaana .
Omukoro gw'okuheza emishomo egi gubaireho nyomwebazyo .
Abazaire bashabwa kushashura ebishare by'amashomero omu bwire .
Omukuru w'eishomero taragambire n'abeegi .
Okukora kw'abeegi kutunguukire .
Obwegyese bushemerire kuba buri obw'obuguzi bukye .
Abaana bashemerire kuza omu mashomero goona baaba bari aha ishomero .
Abaana bashemerire kuhaburwa baaba nibatoorana emirimo .
Eishomero rikaba rikingirwe .
Emigisha mirungi y'emirimo erangiriirwe .
Abazaire bateire sente omu kushomesa abaana baabo .
Abazaire bakagira orukiiko rw'okugaaniira aha mirimo y'abaana baabo .
Abazaire nibeefeerereza bingi kubaasa kuguma n'abaana baabo omu mashomero .
Abaana bashemereire kutayayira abanyabuzaare baabo .
Abazaire bashemereire kureeberera abaana baabo boona .
Ekizibu ky'okutunga amashanyarazi omu muringo ogutarikuhikaana n'obunaku obu kikiriho omu Uganda .
Amashanyarazi agatarikuhwaho omu mwanya gumwe nigasikiriza abashuubuzi .
Minisiture y'ebyamashanyarazi omu Uganda eine murimo ki ?
Okugarukamu nikutuhwera kureeba oburungi bw'ekintu .
Niki ekishemereire kukorwa kureeba ngu amashanyarazi gaguma kandi garikwesigwa omu Uganda ?
Abashuubuzi nibateekateeka aha bintu ebimwe batakatandikire kushuubuza .
Ebika by'emiti ebimwe nibikoresibwa kukora ebikondo by'amashanyarazi .
Ebikondo by'omutindo mubi nibibaasa kugwa omu bwire bw'enjura y'amaani .
Ni murimo ki ogu abany'eishengyero barikukora ?
Amashanyarazi nigapimirwa omu yuniiti ki ?
Ebiziba nibyombekwa aha migyera nari aha migyera .
Ahabwenki turikwetenga abakuru b'obutegyeki ?
Ekitongore kya gavumenti nikikora aha kwihaho oburi bwenguzi omu ofiisi za gavumenti .
Omureeberezi mukuru wa gavumenti akashazamu ebaruha ye ey'okuhindurwa .
Nooha orikujunanizibwa n'okuhindura abakozi ba gavumenti ?
Okucondooza kwa poriisi tikushemerire kuteganisibwa .
Abajurizi abakuru n'abo abarikubaasa kuha obujurizi bw'okubanza aha kintu ekibaireho .
Abeebembezi abaingi baine omuhwezi orikubahwera omu kukora emirimo yaabo .
Okucondooza n'okushwijuma okutebeekanisiibwe gye kuhamya ngu buzima hariho ekyabaho .
Ogu akwatsirwe arikuteekateekwaho kukozesa kubi sente .
Abantu abamwe nibagira ebishuba aha bandi .
Nibaija kuba nibaruga omuka omu mwabazyo .
Abakozi bashemerire kwetantara okubura aha mirimo munonga .
Reka ebintu ebitarikukutwara omumaisho .
Omukozi mugyenzi wangye n'oha ?
Obumwe nikimanyisa ngu tute aharubaju obutaikirizana bwaitu kandi tukore hamwe .
Shaba Ruhanga aha kintu kyona .
Abakozi ba gavumenti nibaheereza abantu boona .
Ebicweka ebimwe nibiremwa kutunguuka ahabw'abeebembezi abaine enguzi n'ababi .
Ahabwenki abantu nibaiba ?
Ekitongore ekirikureeberera gavumenti omuri Uganda nikitandikaho okucondooza aha bikwatiraine n'ebintu bya gavumenti .
Ni mbeera ki ezirikuza kusazibwamu okuhingisa sente ?
Ahabwenki okusindika sente aha simu kushemerire kusazibwamu ?
Abakungu ba gavumenti nibabaasa kutwarwa omu kicweka kyona ekya Uganda kukora emirimo .
Omuhwezi w'omukuru w'eby'obutegyeki arikukora murimo ki ?
Nitubaasa tuta kureeba ngu okucondooza kwagyenda gye ?
Pooriisi neekwata abakozi b'ebibi .
Okukwata omunyarubanja nikimaraho ekintu kyona ?
Naija kuruga omukyaro shaaha zingahi ?
Okubura aha ishomero nikubaasa kuba enshonga erikureetaho okukora kubi .
Entaana z'esente nizibaasa kuguma kushoboorora .
Ku yahuumwire , akaba aine kuhayo ofiisi ahari manegya omusya .
Reka tukore hamwe kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byaitu .
Eiziina rirungi niribaasa kugaruka rita ?
Gavumenti neepangisa abantu kukora aha bwayo .
Hariho oburi bwenguzi bwingi oburikugyenda omu maisho omu ihanga ryeitu .
Sizoni y'ebiro bikuru n'obwire bw'okujaguza .
Ruhanga aine embabazi nyingi .
Ruhanga nakunda buri omwe nk’oku ari .
Aha kiro kya Noiri , nitujaguza okuzaarwa kwa Yesu Kristo .
Yesu Kristo akazaarwa kujuna ensi ebibi byayo .
Amaka nigakoresa sente nyingi aha by'okurya n'ebijwaro omu bwire bw'ebiro bikuru .
Enshohoza y'amaka neekira kweyongyera omu bwire bw'ebiro bikuru .
Nikihikire ngu okujanjaaza orugambo n'omuringo gw'obushomankuzi ?
Kurabira omu kushoma ebyahandikirwe , nitumanya bingi ahari Yesu Kristo .
Omuntu nabaasa ata kwiba esente z'ekanisa ?
Noobaasa kushoboorora ota gye emiringo erikubanganisa ?
Abacondoozi nibategyeka omuringo gw'okucondooza .
Ababazi b'ebitabo nibabaasa kushoboorora gye enshonga eziine akakwate n'esente .
Ekanisa neyetenga kubiika esente zaayo omu banka .
Esente zishemerire kubarwa .
Biika gye esente zaawe .
Esente eziri omu ngaro nizibaasa kubura juba .
Niki ekihandiikirwe omu baruha y'okusaasirwa ?
Niki ekishemereire kukorwa kwihaho oburi bwenguzi omu kanisa ?
Ekanisa eine omuringo gw'obutegyeki ogundi .
Abantu ba buriijo nibabaasa bata kwiba embundu omu mahe g'eihanga rya Uganda ?
Nooha orikujunanizibwa aha mbundu ezibuzire ?
Obwitsi n'obushuma nibireetaho obutagira oburinzi omu kyanga .
Ebitongore by'okwerinda nabyo nibiha abantu oburinzi .
Abantu abamwe baine obusingye kandi baine rukundo .
Abantu boona nibahwera eby'okwerinda omu kurwanisa obuhenda biragiro .
Ebintu bingi bikaguzibwa omu mworeko gw'eby'obushuubuzi .
Nikyetengo ki ekya kafyu ?
Kafyu ekateebwaho ahabw'okutangira okujanjaara kw'endwara ya corona .
Abashuma n'abakozi b'ebibi kandi n'akabi aha bantu .
Omubwire bw'ebiro bikuru , amaka garikurenga ataano gaibirwe omu kicweka eki .
Pooriisi neecondooza ekyaro buri bwire bwa kafyu bwahika .
Ripoota abantu nari ebikorwa byona ebirikuteekateekwaho aha b'obushoboorozi .
Ni murimo ki ogu omuhandiiki w'obutwire arikukora ?
Okucondooza nikugyenda omumaisho aha nguzi omu ofiisi za gavumenti .
Enjuki niziguma omu bishaka .
Esente eziibirwe nizibaasa kugarurwaho zita ?
Abajurizi abakuru n'ab'omugasho munonga omu kucondooza .
Ni kikorwa ki ekihikire ekishemerire kukorwa omu mbeera egi ?
Ahabwenki amabaruha agamwe gashemerire kukopwa abantu abandi ?
Hurikiza obuhabuzi obu bakuhaire .
Niki ekirikureetera abantu kuruga omu ofiisi ?
Ebikorwa ebitari mu mateeka nibifubirwa ebiragiro .
Ekicweka ky'obwegyese nikyetengyesa sente kubaasa kukura .
Niki ekirikubaho aha by'okurya by'okushoroza sente ?
Omushomo gw'okubara esente aha yunivasite nigutwara sente zingahi ?
Okureeberera kubi abaana kureetsireho obuzibu bwingi omu bantu ?
Okukoresa kubi emibazi y'ekitabura bwonko nikukira kubaho ahabw'okugyemeserezibwa ab'orwingano rwawe .
Obwegyese nibugaita okumanya kwaitu aha bintu bingi munonga .
Pooriisi teri omurukiiko rw'ebyokwerinda .
Esimu y'omugambirizi ekaba etariho .
Abantu boona nibahaburwa okukuratira ebiragiro bya mukuru w'ihanga aha ndwara ya Coronavirus .
Abantu abamwe tibarikukuratira okwetaanisa aha bandi .
Entambura zikazibirwa aha disiturikiti eziri aha nshonda zoona .
Abarinzi b'ekiro omu matemba ga Uganda nibakoresa obuta n'obusaasi kuha oburinzi .
Abataka bakakwata omushuma .
Omuturagye akateera omwe aha basirikare amasasi .
Pooriisi ekashanga obuta n'omusyo gw'omuteezi w'akaruuru .
Tikirikumanywa ahabwenki omuteezi w'akaruuru yateera omuporiisi amasasi .
Pooriisi eriyo nerundaana obujurizi obundi oburikuhakanisa omutemu ogu .
Abantu b'omukyanga bakozire na poriisi kukwata omuteezi w'akaruuru .
Ofiisa owaateirwe amasasi hati ari omu mbeera nungi .
Ofiisa ogu atwairwe omu irwariro eri haihi .
Empungi zikaheebwa ebyokurya n'oburaaro .
Abantu b'omukyanga bakahayo empungi ezirikutuura omu kicweka eki .
Ebyokurya nibyo byabaire biri ekyetengo kikuru ekyabaire nikiheebwa empungi .
Bakahayo sente ahari tiimu eziri omu kabi munonga .
Abakuru nibatwarwa nk'abaine oburemeezi kukira abandi .
Ebibiina by'abahingi nibiija kugasirwa omu biconco ebi .
Ebibiina by'abahingi nibiija kutunga obuhwezi bw'eby'obuhingi .
Enjura neegwa omu bwire bw'okuhinga .
Empungi niziija kutunga omuceeri .
Ab'ekyanga basiimire abagabi b'obuhwezi ahabw'obushagiki bwabo .
Okuhayo omu busingye nikuhiga ebindi bibiina kuhwera empungi .
Empungi zigizire ngu hati aine eby'okurya by'okuriisa omwana we .
Empungi agizire ngu hati naija kubaasa kuriisa eka ye ey'abantu mukaaga .
Empungi eyorekire okushemererwa kwe bwanyima y'okutunga eby'okurya .
Abanyamurwa baingi nibahimbisibwa kuhayo obuhwezi aha mpungi .
Empungi ziteganisiibwe oburwaire bwa corona .
Omubaro muhango nigureetera enkambi y'empungi kuba omu kabi munonga omu bwire bwa korona .
Abagabi b'obuyambi nibaija kuba baine kuha ebirikukira aha byetengo by'empungi .
Abakazi abatoorainwe nibaija kutunga ebitambaara by'okweboneza .
Omurinzi w'ekiro akateera omuserukare amasasi .
Abaturagye bakwatsire memba ogu ahari poriisi .
Ofiisa ogu akateerwa amasasi aha mutwe .
Pooriisi ekagarurayo eky'okurwanisa .
Tibarikumanya ahabwenki omushaija yateera omuporiisi amasasi .
Abantu b'omukyanga bakasiimwa ahabw'emirimo mirungi ekozirwe .
Omuserukare owahutaara hati ari aheeru y'akabi .
Omuserukare owahutaara naija kuza kukyeberwa omutwe .
Omunyakyanga akateera omuporiisi amasasi omu mutwe .
Akateerwa amasasi ari aha patrol ya kafyu .
Ofiisa ogu akatwarwa omu irwariro erindi .
Tibarikuhamya ngu n'oha owaateire ofiisa amasasi .
Omuserukare owaateirwe amasasi akaba atari omu mbeera mbi .
Bakasharamu kutwara obuhuta bwe nk'obw'amaani hatariho kugyendera aha ku bwabaire nibushusha .
Pooriisi eri ahansi kusherura owaateire omuporiisi amasasi .
Yahabura abantu kutwara kafyu nk'eky'omugasho .
Abataka nibahaburwa okuha ekitinisa ekiragiro kya kafyu .
Pooriisi ekwatsire omushaija orikuguza obuta n'obusaasi .
Ekitongore ky'ebyokwerinda kikyebeire amagara g'omuporiisi .
Ogu atwairwe aha poriisi .
Abantu b'omukyaro bakahaburwa kukoresa obuta n'obusaasi ahabw'enshonga ezihikire .
Abarwaire bakye ba korona basiiburwa .
Abarwaire basiiburwa kuruga omu irwariro .
Abarwaire nibaruga omu ihanga erindi .
Eirwariro eri nirireeberera abarwaire ba korona .
Abamwe aha barwaire basiiburwa kuruga omu irwariro .
Abarwaire bataano bakaba bari abavugi b'emotoka empango .
Abarwaire ba korona abaingi nibaruga omubyanga .
Omubaro gw'abarwaire nigwija kweyongyera baaba batakwatsirwe gye .
Ondiijo murwaire yasiiburwa erizooba .
Nikyeyongyera kuguma kujanjaba abarwaire .
Tihariho mwanya ogurikumara kushutamamu abarwaire .
Abashaho tibaine bikwato by'okwerinda akakooko ka corona .
Eirwariro ryahamya ngu abarwaire abarekurwa hati barigye .
Abarwaire abasiibuurirwe nibaija kukuratirwa haaba hariho empindahinduka omu by'amagara .
Meeya ashabire ekitongore ky'eby'amagara kugira embabazi aha barwaire .
Abarwaire ba Coronavirus bakaba bataanisiibwe aha bandi .
Tiimu y'eby'amagara ekasiimwa ahabw'okukora gye .
Gavumenti eraganiise kushagika abashaho .
Abarwaire abajanjabirwe gye bakasiiburwa .
Gavumenti eshabirwe kurekura bakama ba bizinesi aha mabanja gaabo .
Bakakozesa esente zaabo omubwire bw'endwara ya korona .
Abaine bizinesi nibashaba okusaasirwa omushoro .
Bizinesi nyingi ziteganisiibwe embeera egi eya korona .
Bizinesi zifeereirwe omubwire bw'endwara ya korona .
Gavumenti eshemerire kuha abashuubuzi emiringo mirungi y'okugumisiriza endwara egi eya korona .
Abakama ba bizinesi beetomboitire amagoba maingi ga banka .
Abaine bizinesi tibaine sente z'okushashura emishoro .
Okubura emirimo ya bizinesi nikikwata kubi aha bantu .
Abantu b'omukyaro bashabire ngu ebishare by'amashanyarazi bikyendeezibwe .
Gavumenti eshemerire kuhurikiza bakama ba bizinesi kuyamba kukyendeeza obworo .
Abarikukora aha nshonga z'obutegyeki bashemerire kutunguura okucondooza kw'obutegyeki .
Ekanisa ya Uganda niyo eine eirwariro eri .
Ensharamu niziija kukorwa bwanyima y'okwebuuza ahari ba Bishopu .
Abakozi bakeesharinga ahabw'okutashashurwa emishaara .
Omuntu omwe tarikubaasa kucwamu ahabw'ekyanga kyona .
Enkora y'irwariro ehindwirwemu .
Abakiiki barengyesereize enshonga z'amarwariro .
Hariho obutaikirizana omu beebembezi b'ekanisa .
Batandika okucondooza kuhwera enjuyi zombi ezikwatsirweho .
Hariho omwanya muhango gw'okugaaniira ahagati y'ebibiina bibiri .
Abanyamahanga baheireyo obushagiki aha marwariro aga .
Okwongyera aha bakozi nikwija kureeba ngu obuheereza bwakora gye .
Eirwariro eri ritakatungire buhwezi kuruga aheeru y'ihanga kumara obwire hati .
Eirwariro nirikora gye n'obu abakozi baraabe bari baingi .
Emishaara y'abakozi eshemerire kuhindurwa .
Abakozi b'irwariro bakahaburwa ngu bagumisirize tiimu egi .
Abakozi b'irwariro bashabire kwongyeza omushoro .
Eirwariro n'ekitongore ekitarikukorera sente .
Abarwaire b'amaisho bakaba nibatwarwa nk'ababingirwe omu kicweka .
Ebitanda by'irwariro byeyongyeire .
Gavumenti neeha obuhwezi buri mwaka aha marwariro .
Kamera ziteirweho kukyendeeza aha buhenda biragiro .
Kamera niziteebwa omu ihanga ryona .
Bakataho kamera nyingi kukira oku baabaire batebeekaniise .
Omuringo gw'okutaho kamera gutandikire aha rwakana .
Kamera eziteirweho tizirikukora .
Kamera niziija kureeba butandu n'obuhenda biragiro .
Kamera ezi ziteirwe omu myanya y'okushuuburiramu .
Kamera niziija kuza omu mwanya gw'abajurizi .
Kamera ezi niziija kukoresibwa kusherura enamba z'emotoka .
Okutaho kamera nikwija kutandika omu tauni .
Omujwekyerwa wa paramenti akahayo tani y'ebihimba .
Kandi bakahayo ebihimba n'embibo z'ebihimba .
Enjuma zikaba ziheebwa abahingi butoosha .
Esente eziraatungye niziija kukoresibwa omukurwanisa endwara ya Coronavirus .
Ebiconco ebiherize kuheebwayo nibiija kuba biri aha ndwara ya corona .
Eirwariro rikatunga kompyuta y'okuhandiika ebihandiiko by'abarwaire .
Abantu b'omukyaro bakashabwa kukoresa gye esente ezi .
Zimwe aha sente ezi niziija kuheebwa ab'ebyokwerinda .
Omwebembezi naija kukozesa esente ezi kuhwera ekicweka kye omubwire obu obw'endwara ya Coronavirus .
Omwebembezi akakozesa sente ze kuteeka amajuta omu motoka z'abarwaire ezaabaire zitebeekanisiibwe kukozesebwa ahabwa korona .
Omwebembezi w'ekicweka akagura ambulensi mushanju .
Abeebembezi abamwe bakahayo embibo z'okuhinga n'ebintu .
Aba disiturikiti tibarikukuratira ebiragiro bya korona .
Eishomero eri rikozesiibwe kwetaanisa aha barwaire ba corona .
Abantu nka makumi ataano n'omwe nibo bayetaanisiibwe aha bandi .
Ekitongore kya karantiini kyaheza kuhika aha rurengo rwakyo .
Abantu nka bana abandi beegaita aha kwetaanisa aha bandi .
Abeebembezi b'ebicweka bakanga munonga okukozesa amashomero g'abarwaire ba korona .
Abarwaire nibaija kuguma omu maka gaabo .
Emyanya ya karantiini eijwiire abarwaire .
Bashemereire kurahutsya okuronda abarwaire ba Coronavirus .
Abarikuteekateekwaho kuba baine oburwaire obu nibakyeberwa kumara ebiro ikumi na bina .
Amashomero tigashemerire kukoresibwa nka emyanya ya karantini .
Gavumenti eshemerire kutunga emyanya ya karantini ey'obwegyese .
Abarwaire ba Coronavirus nibajanjabirwa omu irwariro ry'ekyanga .
Empungi nizironda emiringo y'okutaaha omu ihanga .
Empungi nizejumba omu kuriisa enyamaishwa n'okuhinga aha nshonda zoona .
Omujwekyerwa wa paramenti tarikwikirizana n'ensharamu ezikozirwe ahabw'eihanga rye .
Takwenda kwekorera sente za gavumenti .
Esente ezitebeekanisiibwe ahabwa Coronavirus niziija kukoresibwa ahabw'ekigyendererwa kyazo kyonyini .
Akaraganisa kukuratira ebiragiro ebirikushagikwa ebiragiro .
Akagarura sente ezo omu ishengyero nk'oku sipiika yashabire .
Tindikwija kukuratira ekiragiro ekitari mu mateeka ekyateirweho purezidenti .

Ni okukinga omugaati gw'endwara ensya aha bakazi n'abaishiki .
Abantu abaine endwara egi ey'akakoko nibatuuraho obwire buraingwa ebiro ebi .
Nikirungi buriijo kugaaniira n'abantu abaine endwara egi .
Emirimo y'obushambani eri nyingi omu minyeeto omumyanya y'obutaaho omuri Kampala .
Omubaro gw'abantu abarikutuura n'endwara egi gweyongyeire kandi tibarikutunga bujanjabi .
Abakozi b'eby'amagara abamwe tibaine kureeberera abarwaire baabo .
Abakozi b'eby'amagara nibaheebwa obushoboorozi bw'okuha obuheereza bw'eby'amagara obuhikire aha bantu boona .
Ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe byeija byahwera omukuzibira okujanjaara kw'endwara egi .
Ekitongore eki nikiha obujanjabi bwa busha n'okureeberera abantu abaine endwara egi ey'obukooko .
Nibateeraho abantu b'omu kyanga n'okukyeberwa n'okuhabura .
Abazaara b'obuhangwa bakazibirwa omu Uganda , kwonka nibagumizamu .
Purezidenti taragiire aha mukoro ogu .
Omuhwezi wa purezidenti niwe yajwekyera purezidenti aha mukoro ogu .
Minisita yahereeza disiturikiti egi emotoka ibiri z'abarwaire .
Abantu bakahwamu amaani omugyenyi w'ekitiinisa obu ataizire .
Okubaho kwe nk'omuntu kukaba nikwija kumanyisa bingi aha bantu .
Bakaba nibetenga obuhwezi bw'esente kubaasa kutwara purojekiti egi .
Bakaba nibateekateeka akabonero k'omutaano kuruga aha mugyenyi w'ekitiinisa .
Nibaija kubugana kugaaniira aha kwombeka ekishaayi ekisya .
Akasinga ekikopo kye ky'okubanza eky'omuntu wenka obu yasinga empaka z'abato omwaka oguhwaire .
Purezidenti yaraganisa ngu naija kuha sente z'okuhwera purojekiti egi ahabwe wenka .
Okuburaho kwe kukashiisha ekishushani kye omu bantu .
Nateekateekwaho kubataayaayira obwire bwona .
Okusheenya emigugu nikwija kweyongyera ahabw'okukyendeera kw'amaizi g'enyanja ya Victoria .
Amaizi makye gaine akakwate kakuru n'okukora amashanyarazi .
Ekyombeko ky'amashanyarazi kikatandikirwaho kutunguura amakorero omu kicweka ekyo .
Okukyendeeza aha motoka nikwija kutwara wiiki ibiri .
Ebiziba nibiija kwombekwa kutunguura amaizi n'okukora enyanja y'okubiikamu amaizi .
Bafeereirwe sente ahabw'okukyendeeza aha motoka .
Abeebembezi ba disiturikiti nibasherura omuhanda gw'okushohoza amashanyarazi .
Hariho orukiiko nyenkyakare rw'okutaho obukodyo bw'okugaruraho amashanyarazi omu kicweka kyabo .
Abeebembezi abamwe tibarikukora eki babahairwe kukora .
Abeebembezi ba disiturikiti bakahandikira kampuni y'amashanyarazi ebaruha barikworeka obutashemererwa bwabo .
Tibarikubaasa kugumisiriza okukyendeeza aha migugu .
Titurikutunga kugarukwamu kwona kuruga omubarikukora amashanyarazi .
Minisita yahereeza disiturikiti egi emotoka z'abarwaire ishatu .
Abeebembezi ba disiturikiti baakiira ambulensi n'okushemererwa .
Nikitwara esente nyingi kutunga eby'amagara omu kicweka kyaitu .
Abantu b'omukyaro bakamusiima munonga ahabw'okuhayo obuhwezi .
Omu nshonga y'okutwarwa omu irwariro , omurwaire aine kushashura esente z'amajuta .
Nikirungi nyina omwana kutebeekanisa enda ye .
Omwebembezi wa disiturikiti akamusiima ahabw'okugira omutima gw'embabazi n'okugaba .
Akagarurira abantu nk'akamanyiso k'okusiima ahabw'okumuteera akaruuru .
Abeebembezi bashemerire kugaruka ahansi kandi bamanye obuzibu obu abantu baabo barikutunga .
Buri izooba abakazi n'abaishiki baingi nibafa ahabw'ebintu ebirikubaasa kuzibirwa eby'okutwara enda n'okuzaara .
Nitukusiima ahabw'omukazi w'amaani ou ori .
Okwesiga n'ekintu eki abantu babiri omurukundo barikubaasa kwombeka hamwe .
Abeebembezi abamwe nibeebwa abantu ababateire akaruuru ngu babe ahu bari .
Akagaruza busya enguuto zoona omu kicweka kye .
Ahabw'omutima gwe murungi , akahurira abantu be nibetenga ambulensi .
Yashohoza ngu ambulensi nizimwe aha bintu ebitarikushashurwa emishoro .
Okuguza emotoka emwe niyo nshonga yonka ei yaabaire aine .
Amashanyarazi nigahwera omu kukyendeeza obworo .
Nk'omukazi , nimmanya okubonabona oku abakazi barikurabamu baaba nibazaara .
Abakazi baingi abaine enda baine kugyendera engyendo ndaingwa kuhika omu irwariro .
Ambulensi ezi zigabirwe omu marwariro gatari gamwe na gamwe omu disiturikiti .
Okujaguza oku nikwija kuba aha kitebe kikuru kya disiturikiti .
Ekiro eki nikiija kukuzibwa buri mwaka .
Obugyenyi bw'okugaitwa bwingi bukagarurwaho nari nangwa bwasazibwamu ahabw'endwara ya Korona .
Kurabira omu bya inginiya , abantu baingi nibatunga emirimo .
Ebintu by'obuhangwa byacwekyerezibwa , eby'obuhangwa nibishiisha .
Empindahinduka y'obwire n'okubura amaizi nabyo n'ekindi kizibu eki ba inginiya barikutunga .
Abeebembezi b'ediini nibakwatanisa omu kutunguura ekyaro kyaitu .
Ninyenda kumanya ekirikwetengwa kuba inginiya ?
Okuteerana kw'abantu kukyemereziibwe okuzibira okujanjaara kwa akakooko ka corona .
Omu mbeera ezirimu oburinzi bw'abantu , nikyetengyesa inginiya kuba aine orusa .
Abeebembezi batebekaniise okutendekwa kwa ba inginiya boona omukyanga .
Buri inginiya aine obujunaanizibwa aha murimo gwona ogukozirwe omu muringo gw'obutafayo .
Ekyanga nikibaasa kutunga bingi barikworeka abaishiki bato eby'obuhangwa .
Abashomesa bashemerire kwegyesa abeegi oku barikubaasa kwakiira eby'obuhangwa kandi batarikutiina .
Etara z'omu nguuto nizireetera abantu kuhurira baine oburinzi nyekiro .
Ekibira ekyo n'eka y'abakozi b'ebibi n'abashuubuzi b'emibazi y'ekitabura bwonko .
Nikireetera enguuto kuhurira ziine oburinzi n'obukuumi , namunonga aha bakazi .
Etara z'omu nguuto nizireetera abashuubuzi kukora eshaaha nyingi .
Omwika ogurikuruga omu mataara g'omu kicweka nigukwata aha magara g'omuntu .
Abashuma nibabaasa kutoorana omwanya ogurikureebeka nk'ogutarimu bukuumi .
Abanyarubanja ku barikukwatwa , nibaha ebituga poriisi kubarekura .
Disiturikiti teine ​​sente z'okuboneza ebitaara by'okwerinda .
Amatara againe obwire bukye nigakira kuhindurwa .
Abashaija bataano bakwatsirwe ahabw'okwiba ebitaara by'aha nguuto .
Yahabura ngu n'eky'omuhendo mukye okukozesa ebitaara by'eizooba aha nguuto .
Disiturikiti ekataho sente z'okutaho ebitaara , kwonka tibikaguziibwe .
Juba munonga , ebitaara nibiija kutandika kukora .
Etara z'eizooba zikateebwaho kwonka battery zikaibwa nyekiro .
Etawuni yeitu eine enguuto ezirikukirayo oburungi omu tauni yoona .
Abakazi baine obugabe kwejumba omuby'obutegyeki bw'eihanga .
Akakiiko nikashaba ba memba kushoborora ebi baahaireyo omu bwire .
Abeebembezi b'abakazi omu disiturikiti bakaba baherize kuhikiiriza ebi baraganiise .
Ekibiina ky'abashuubuzi omu disiturikiti kihaireyo entebe zoona ezirikwetengyesa omukoro ogu .
Omukoro gw'erizooba gutungire abagyenyi baingi waagyeragyeranisa n'ogw'omwaka oguhweire .
Abakazi batendekirwe omu mirimo mingi erikureeta sente omu mwaka gwona .
Amaduuka agamwe makuru omu rurembo n'aga abakazi .
Ekishushani ky'abakazi kitunguukire waagyeragyeranisa n'eira .
Abakazi bashagikire abashaija baabo omu by'esente omu kutunguura amaka gaabo .
Ekiro ky'abakazi nikikuzibwa buri mwaka omu kwezi kwa kashatu omu ihanga ryona .

Abakazi bakahinga omuti gumwe omu kujaguza kw'omwaka oguhweire .

Emishomo y'obwegyese neehwera abeegi kuhika gye .
Amashomero ga gavumenti omu kicweka kyaitu gakakora gye omwaka oguhweire .
Okubara kukakorwa kubi omu disiturikiti yoona .
Orikukurira eby'obwegyese asiimire abashomesa ahabw'omurimo murungi ogu bakozire .
Amashomero agamwe gakahemuka munonga ahabw'ebirugiremu bibi .
Tihariho n'omwe owatungire obubonero buna omukyaro kyaitu omwaka ogu .
Abaishiki bakozire gye kukira aboojo omwaka ogu .
Eishomero eririkukirayo oburungi omu disiturikiti rikatunga obubonero makumi ana na buna .
Orikukurira eby'obwegyese ahaire abashomesa obuhabuzi ngu bateho ebigyezo buri wiiki kubaasa kutunga ebirungi .
Abakuru b'amashomero abamwe bagarukire ahansi ahabw'okukora kubi .
Ku arikutunga ebicweka birungi , omukuru w'eishomero naasiimwa munonga ahabw'okukora munonga .
Okucondooza nikworeka ngu abaana nibeega juba munonga baaba nibeegyesibwa omu rurimi rwabo .
Abashomesa omu mashomero g'omu byaro nibakunda kwetantara emirimo bataine nshonga z'amazima .
Abazaire okutashashura kubi ebishare nikikwata munonga aha byaruga omu beegi .
Eishomero eryakozire gye omwaka oguhwaire rikakyendeera omwaka ogu .
Eishomero eri rigumire omu mwanya gwaryo omu disiturikiti kumara emyaka etaano .
Ahabw'okukora kubi , abazaire nibagyemeserezibwa kuhindura amashomero g'abaana baabo .
Okubura abashomesa abaine ebisaanyizo ebirikumara omu disiturikiti nikireetaho okukora kubi .
Amashomero agatandikirweho ekanisa gaine enteekateeka y'okuriisa abaana baabo .
Bashatu ahari ba minisita ba kabineti nibaruga omu disiturikiti yaitu .
Omwe aha bakuru ababaire bari abeebembezi b'eihanga eri akaruga omu kyaro kyaitu .
Ekimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebi abashaija barikukora omu kweshemeza omu Uganda n'okunywa amaarwa .
Abeegi baingi nibafeerwa ebigyezo ahabw'abazaire kuremwa kushashura ebishare by'eishomero .
Abaana abaine guruupu z‘abakaikuru/abagurusi baine emigisha mingi y‘okuremwa omu by‘obwegyese .
Abazaire bashemereire kureeba ngu abaana bakora emirimo yaabo y'omuka buri izooba .
Okukuza gye omwana nikirugamu ebirungi .
Abeegi abamwe bakakwatwa kandi bafubirwa ahabw'okutaaha omu kishengye kya disco .
Ebimwe aha myanya y'okweshemezamu ebikingirwe ahabw'okwikirizibwa abaishiki bato kutaaha .
Abaishiki omu byaro nibeejumba omu bikorwa by'obushambani bakiri bato .
Amashomero nigatuma abeegi bakora emirimo y'omuka wiikendi yoona .
Abeegi abamwe abaine emitima egumire nibatoroka aha ishomero obwire butakahikire .
Amashomero nigashanga kigumire kutegyeka abaana abasiisikaire .
Nkaba ninkunda kuta omwana wangye omu ishomero ry'okuraaramu okukira eizooba rimwe .
Abazaire baine kuba abagumire munonga aha ntambura y'abaana baabo .
Enkora mbi neebaasa kureetera omwegi kuremwa .
Ni kibi munonga kwohereza abaana omu mashomero bataine by'okurya .
Ofiisa akamanyisa abazaire aha kabi k'okwega aha nda .

Eminyeeto mingi etungire ebiconco by'omupiira omu Uganda .
Kiraabu z'omupiira zoona ziine abashagiki omu ihanga ryona .
Ekibiina ky'omupiira nikitoorana abazaani abaine ebiconco kuruga omu nshonda zoona z'eihanga .
Abantu abamwe buriijo nibasigara enyima omu nshonga z'entunguuka omu byaro byabo .
Omukwatsi wa gooro wa kiraabu akajunanwa ebishuba ngu akashiisha omwishiki w'emyaka ikumi n'etaano .
Ekicweka eki nikyetenga ekishaayi ky'okuzaaniramu emipiira y'omukago nk'omuringo gw'okwegyezamu .
Abahagizi ba kiraabu egi bashemereirwe ahabw'okuzaana kw'abazaani baabo .
Uganda eine kiraabu z'omupiira zirikurenga ikumi omu liigi y'eihanga .
Yashaba abashagiki ba kiraabu egi kuguma baine omutima gw'amaani .
Amakampuni makuru nigashagika omuzaano gw'omupiira omu ihanga buri mwaka .

Ni tiimu y'omupiira erikukirayo oburungi omu disiturikiti .
Kiraabu nazo nizitunga abazaani barungi kuruga omu mpaka z'amashomero g'eihanga .
Kiraabu ezi nizikozesa abantu abandi baingi okwihaho abazaani .
Tiimu nazo nizitunga oburemeezi omu kutwara emirimo yaabo omu mwaka gwona .
Ofiisi y'eby'emizaano omu disiturikiti ehereize kiraabu z'eminyeeto zoona ebijwaro by'omupiira .
Yashaba tiimu kwereeberera gye omu mpaka zoona .

Ceyamaani agambire n'abantu b'omukyanga .

Abahingi bashemerire kukora hamwe kutunguura eby'okurya .
Disiturikiti neyetenga kuha abakozi b'okujanjaaza eby'entambura .
Minisiture ebaganiisemu abahingi b'ebihimba , omukaru , omuceeri hamwe na muhogo .

Hariho abakazi bakye aba inginiya omu ihanga .

Purojekiti egi ehereize abantu ba Arua emigisha y'emirimo .
Abaturagye abamwe bakahayo eitaka eri purojekiti egi eraatandikyeho .
Amashanyarazi tigateirweho aha bifunjo ahabw'okuba nigagyendera aha maizi g'enjura .
Abanyabwengye bakakyebera omugyera Okabi ahabw'okutandikaho purojekiti y'amashanyarazi .
Omugyera gukaba gwine amaizi agatarikuhinduka agaabaire nigakoresibwa n'okufukirira .
Omugyera ogu gukaba nigubaasa kureeta amashanyarazi g'ekyaro kyona .

Abantu b'omu kyanga bakateerana eby'obugaiga by'omu kyanga ahabwa purojekiti egi .

Abantu bakaba bashemereirwe ahabw'okutunga amashanyarazi .

Abantu bakaba baine etabaaza omu maka gaabo n'emyanya y'okushagikiraho esimu .
Gavumenti ekayombekyera omuturagye owaabaire naahayo eitaka rye enju y'obutwire .
Abantu abamwe bakahakanisa purojekiti y'amashanyarazi ahabw'okugira ngu omuturagye akaraganisibwa enju .
Abantu bakwatsirwe ahabw'okwiba ebikwato by'amashanyarazi .

Purojekiti ya pico power ekahindura abaturagye kuhakanisana .

Akegyesa abacurira aha bukuru bw'okuhandiika endagaano .
Endagaano neija kuzibira enshonga ezitarikwetengyesa omu b'omumaka .
Akahabura abantu b'omukyanga okutuura omubusingye baaba bari omunsi .
Twena nitwija kwemerera omu maisho ga Ruhanga eizooba rimwe .
Omugyenzi abaire ari omutendeki w'omupiira omu disiturikiti ye .
Nk'omutendeki , tiimu ye ekasinga emizaano etari emwe n'emwe .
Omugyenzi yasigaho omufaakazi hamwe n'abaana ikumi na babiri .
Ekibiina nikiija kushabira omufu kumara ebiro bishatu .
Okushaba nikwija kutandika omu kwezi kwa mukaaga .
Gavumenti ekakora disiturikiti ensya kuruga omu disiturikiti eyaabaire eriho .
Eshaara za disiturikiti niziija kutandika wiiki erikukurataho .
Bahaburwa ngu bashabire ekicweka ky'obusingye .
Kandi nibaija kushaba oburi bwenguzi .
Omwebembezi akatebeekanisa okushaba kwa disiturikiti .
Abeebembezi nibahaburwa kwetantara oburi bwenguzi .
Omukyara w'okubanza naija kuba ari omugyenyi w'ekitiinisa aha mukoro ogu .
Abeebembezi b'ebyobutegyeki nibaija kuba bari aha mukoro ogu .
Archbishop omusya naija kutooranwa omwaka ogurikuza kwija .
Archbishop omugurusi naija kuha orubazo rwe aha mukoro gw'okusibura .
Abeebembezi nibahuumura aha myaka nkaaga n'etaano .
Obwire obumwe akaheereza nk'omumiisani aine emyaka ikumi na mwenda .
Ebikuru ebi yaakozire nibiija kwijukwa .
Akabuurira okurwanisa okuguza abantu omukyanga kye .
Kandi akabuurira aha kuhakanisa obutabanguko oburikureetwaho obuhangwa bw'abantu omu kyanga .
Abashaija tibashemerire kuta emikono aha mukazi .
Obutabanguko oburikureetwaho obuhangwa bw'abantu n'omucwe gwa ira munonga .
Ekyanga kiine kurwanisa obutabanguko oburikureetwaho abakazi n'abakazi .
Abaishiki abato bashemerire kuguma omu mashomero okwetantara okutwara enda omu myaka y'obushogoyo .
Ripoota aha butabanguko bw'abakazi n'abakazi .
Nikiba kiri eky'obwengye omuntu kureka omukago gw'okutoroboza .
Kampeyini egi ekaba egyendereire kugasira abooro .
Gavumenti neeshorooza ebiteekateeko kuruga omu biteekateeko by‘abantu b‘omu kyanga .
Abantu b'omu katare nibakira kukoresa ebigambo ebishaarizi .
Abashaija baine kukora munonga kureeberera amaka gaabo omu by'esente .
Emigyenzo emwe ey'obuhangwa neenyigiriza obuhangwa bw'abakazi .
Obuhangwa nibuhabura abantu kutuura gye .
Abakazi baingi abaine erangi erikutukura nibeehuzya erangi zaabo omu bwire bukye .
Obushwere nibuhenda ahabw'ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe .
Obushwere buri oburikwera kandi oburikwikirizibwa omu maisho ga Ruhanga .
Omushaija n’omukazi we bashemereire kusaasirana enshobe .
Ahabwenki abantu abamwe kigumire kusaasira abandi ?
Abakundaine baine kugyendera aha kukora n'okushagikana .
Abakazi nibakira kushereka abashaija baabo esente zaabo .
Emishoro neereetaho okweyongyera kw'ebintu .
Okukozesa sente z'omu ngaro , abantu hati nibabaasa kushoboorora esente z'okushashura aha simu .
Omushoro gwateebwa aha kintu , omuhendo gwakyo nigweyongyera .
Abashuubuzi bashemerire kuba baine obukugu burungi omuby'obushuubuzi .
Enshonga zitari zimwe na zimwe nizikwata aha muheendo gw'ekintu .
Amashanyarazi agarikugarukaho nigarundaanwa kuruga omu bintu ebirikugarukaho .
Sitoovu z'okuteeka na biogas nizikoresibwa omu kutekyera .
Kampuni neebaasa eta kuguza ebintu byayo ?
Ebintu ebirikuruga omu izooba nibigura sente nyingi .
Omukozesa naabaasa ata kumanya ekintu ky'eizooba eky'ebishuba ?
Abashuubuzi nibatwara akabi .
Okweyongyera kw'abaguzi nikureetaho okukura kwa bizinesi .
Obumanyi nibubaasa kutendekwa nari kutunga .
Emikoro neekira kubamu omugyenyi w'omutaano omu bagyenyi abandi .
Eby'okurya bya kyakiro nibikira kuba eby'omu mwabazyo .
Gavumenti ekore ki kutunguura omutindo gw'obwegyese ?
Abeegi nibashagikwa abazaire baabo nari abareeberezi baabo ahabw'obwegyese .
Amashomero gaine kuha abeegi obuheereza bw'okuhabura aha mirimo .
Akaheza gye diguri ye arikushagikwa ekitongore eki .
Abeegi abaine obwengye kuruga omu maka agatarikwebaasa beetungire obuhwezi .
Abaishiki bakye nibo barikubaasa kuheza amashomero waagyeragyeranisa n'aboojo .
Sayansi neeteekateekwaho kuba ey'okwega okugumire .
Toorana eki orikwenda kandi ebindi obireke .
Obwegyese bushemerire kwebembezibwa .
Ahabw'amaani goona agu bateiremu , bakabaasa kutunga sente zoona ezaabaire nizetengyesa .
Okuhwera abandi ni kikuru munonga .
Hoteeri ezimwe nizigura sente nyingi munonga .
Twine kwija n'eby'okugarukamu by'okusingura obutabanguko oburikureetwaho obuhangwa omu maka .
Obugabe bw'abantu n'obw'abakazi n'abakazi bombi .
Ni bukoryo ki obuteirweho kuremesa obutabanguko oburikureetwaho obuhangwa bw‘abantu ?
Nitukora ki okureeberera ebyobuhangwa ?
Emigyenzo y'obuhangwa emwe neenyigiriza .
Obutabanguko oburikureetwaho obuhangwa bw'abantu nibureetaho okwehwa amatsiko kw'abarikuteganisibwa .
Niki ekikozirwe kurwanisa obutabanguko oburikureetwaho obuhangwa bw'abantu ?
Obutabanguko tiburikwikirizibwa omu bantu .
Okwehayo nikutwara okumariirira n'okwefeerereza .
Omurimo gw'ekanisa ni guuha ?
Omuzaano gw'okujunaana tigurikubaasa kumaraho ekintu kyona .
Abeebembezi b'ekanisa bashemerire kuhiga abantu kutuura omu busingye .
Abashwereine bashemerire kukora hamwe .
Ni bizibu ki ebi abantu barikutunga obunaku obu ?
Amagara g'abakazi n'amagara g'abakazi omu bwire bw'okutwara enda .
Abakazi b'enda abamwe nibafa barikuzaara .
Abashaija abaingi ebiro ebi nibahunga obujunaanizibwa bw'omu maka .
Obushambani bureeteire obushwere bwingi kushenyuka .
Abashaija nibahaburwa kureeberera abakazi baabo baaba baine enda .
Omukazi we bamuzaire kuruga omu irwariro erya Mulago .
Abazaarisa nibahwera abakazi baaba nibazaara .
Abakazi , ninshaba ngu mumarirwe n'ebi mwine .
Abakazi abaine enda nibahigwa kuza omu irwariro obwire bw'okuzaara butakahikire .
Abakazi bashemerire kurinda obuyonjo bwabo .
Okutwara enda juba n'eky'akabi aha magara g'omwishiki muto .
Abakazi tibarikukora gye obwire .
Ekigyendererwa ky'okwiruka kw'empungi okuhango nikimanyisa ki ?
Ebintu ebirikubaho buri mwaka nibikorwa buri mwaka .
Empungi nizikira kutuura omu nkambi z'empungi .
Ahabwenki ekiro ky'empungi omunsi yoona kirikukuzibwa ?
Abazaani b'emizaano bari omunsi yoona .
Okwiruka n'omuringo gw'okukora ebisasayizi by'omubiri .
Emizaano mingi eriho abantu kuzaana .
Abantu abaine oburema baine kutwarizibwa nk'abandi .
Abantu abamwe tibarikumanya ebiconco byabo .
Etalanta nizikuzibwa , kandi nizikura n'okugumizamu nizegyezamu .
Omuzaani w'emizaano n'omuntu orikumanya gye eby'emizaano .
Emivuyo y'eby'amagara neetebeekanisibwa ahabw'okushoroza sente .
Ebirikuhiga n'entandikwa y'amatsiko .
Omuringo gw'ahonaaho gukaba guri ogw'okuteganisibwa .
Empungi n'abazaarwa b'amahanga agandi .
Abanyabuntu nibafayo aha kutunguura obugwagye bw'abantu .
Omwegyemure gukabinga abantu omu maka gaabo omu bwire bw'enjura .
Ni murimo gwa gavumenti okurinda abaturagye baayo .
Empungi nizetenga kuhurira ziine oburinzi omu ihanga eririkuzitaayaayira .
Ni bibiina ki ebiine orusa kukora obuhwezi bw'amateeka omu Uganda ?
Ekibiina ky'amahanga ageteeraine kiine zimwe aha ofiisi zaakyo ezirikukorera omu Uganda .
Ripoota eine kworeka amakuru marungi .
Bakata omu nkora ebiteekateeko nk'oku ebyabaire nibigabwa abantu b'omu kyanga .
Ripoota nizimanyisa bingi .
Ripoota eri nk'omuringo gw'okugarukamu okuhandiikirwe .
Pooriisi neeheereza abantu boona hamwe n'eihanga ryona .
Abahikirweho obutabanguko nibetenga obuhwezi kurabira omu kuhaburwa .
Abaramuzi , abaramuzi n'abandi ni bamwe aha bakozi b'eby'emanja omu Uganda .
Oburi bwenguzi niburemesa entunguuka .
Uganda neetunga obuhwezi kuruga omunsi yoona ahabw'amahanga agandi .
Engudo ezirikugaita emyanya egyo ziijwire ebiina by'emiti .
Omu buhangwa abashaija nibakira abakazi .
Obutabanguko aha bakazi nibweyongyera omuri Afirika .
Obuhangwa bukwatsire aha butaikirizana omu by'obuhangwa omuri Afirika .
Tihariho kitiinisa okumanyisa omushaija waawe ahari poriisi .
Obuheereza bw'eby'amagara nibubaasisa abakazi kuraba omu nda n'okuzaara bataine kabi koona .
Ekitongore eki nikita omutima aha kurwanisa obugabe bw'abakazi abaine abaana .
Obutaikirizana omu by'obuhangwa buri ahaiguru omu myanya y'aheeru ya Afirika .
Abeebembezi b'ebika nibatwara omugisha gw'abakazi n'obu abashaija baraabe bari omu nshobe .
Obutabanguko nibukwata munonga aha bakazi n'abaishiki .
Buri izooba hariho emishango y'obutabanguko omu maka erikugambwaho ahari poriisi .
Abakuru b'ebyaro nibeetwa kuhabura abantu kurekyera aho obutabanguko obu .
Ekibiina ekyahamba omwishiki muto akafa kyakwatwa .
Okukoresa kubi emibazi y'ekitabura bwonko n'okuginywa nibikwata aha bantu .
Obutabanguko nibubaasa kuzibirwa kuruga aha muzi .
Ekitongore eki nikihwera ba memba baakyo kutunguura eby'entaasya yaabo omu byaro .
Emiti neeha ebinyonyi bingi eby'okurya n'amaka .
Ekitongore eki nikikoragana n'ekanisa hamwe n'eby'obwegyese .
Ekanisa ehimbiise abantu munonga kuhinga emiti .
Okusheenya eitaka nikukyendeeza aha burungi bw'itaka .
Abantu b'omu kyanga nibahimbisibwa kuhinga emiti aha itaka eritarikukoresibwa .
Bishopu ashabire ekanisa kukoragana n'ebitongore ebirikuhinga emiti .
Abeegi kuruga omu matendekyero g'obwegyese gatari gamwe na gamwe beejumbire omu kuhinga emiti .
Enjuma z'emiti zigabirwe omu mashomero abiri aga siniya .
Ekanisa niyo erikureeberera okubyara emiti .
Pooriisi terikworeka ekihandiiko ky'okukwatwa .
Buri omwe aine obugabe kutunga omuramuzi .
Baremirwe kureeta obujurizi omu kooti ngu akakora omushango ogu .
Abapooriisi bakamutwara .
Ogu ow'emyaka makumi abiri akwatsirwe ahabw'okuteera emotoka ya Minisita amabaare .
Purezidenti asiimire amahe g'omutaano ahabw'okurinda obusingye n'obukuumi .
Baremirwe kumanya abantu abateire emotoka amabaare .
Abakuru b'amahe bakagarurwa omu kooti y'amahe .
Akamushaba okusaasirwa ahabw'okukwatwa ataine saasi .
Okukwatwa kwe kukaba kutari mu mateeka ahabwokuba akaba ataine mushango gwona ogu akozire .
Abashaija abamukwatsire tibakamanyirwe .
Akaruga omu irwariro abakuru batamanyire .
Tihariho buhame oburikworeka ngu akakora ekibi .
Okukora orubanja kwongyeziibwe kuhisya wiiki erikwija .
Gavumenti etaire obuhumbi buna omu kwombeka enguuto omu burugwa izooba .
Omurimo ogu gwatongozibwa nyomwebazyo aha kitebe kikuru kya disiturikiti .
Nikiija kutunguura omutindo gw'amagara g'abantu omu kicweka ky'omu matemba .
Ni okuhwera omu kutunguura obuheereza bw'omutindo murungi .
Abakuru ba disiturikiti abamwe nibakoresa kubi esente za gavumenti .
Akagira orukiiko n'abantu abu yaabaire nateekateeka ngu nibaija kuha endagaano .
Ebitongore biine kukora hamwe omu bwire bw'okuta purojekiti omu nkora .
Purojekiti zishemerire kuta omu nkora eby'okugarukamu bisya .
Gavumenti etaire amaani omu kutunguura amateeka ga Uganda .
Enguuto ensya zikozirwe omu disiturikiti nyingi omwaka ogu .
Abantu baingi nibafeerwa amagara gaabo n'ebintu byabo ahabw'entaro .
Ekicweka kya matemba kya Uganda kiine obuhangwa bw'amaani omu kuriisa ente .
Eirwariro risya niriza kutunguura eby'amagara omu kicweka eki .
Obuheereza bwaitu obw'eby'obujanjabi omu disiturikiti buri ahansi munonga waagyeragyeranisa n'ebindi .
Niriija kuba eirwariro rihango omu kicweka kya bukiizi-bwa-bumosho .
Abaturagye kuruga omu disiturikiti eziri haihi nabo nibaija kwija aha kutunga obujanjabi .
Okwombeka oku nikuteekateekwaho kutwara emyaka ebiri .
Omubaro gw'abakozi b'eby'amagara gweyongyeire waagyeragyeranisa n'emyaka ehweire .
Ekitongore kirungi ky'obujanjabi kishemerire kuha obuheereza bwona obu abarwaire barikwetenga .
Abashaho baingi abajungu nibakira abashaho abeeru .
Hariho amarwariro makye g'abantu abaine endwara z'omutwe omu Uganda .
Minisiture etaireho amarwariro buri hamwe omu ihanga .
Ceyamaani ahaireyo eitaka rye kwombekaho eirwariro .
Abantu bashemereirwe n'amaani ga gavumenti omu kutunguura eby'amagara omu Uganda .
Ebibiina by'ediini bitandikireho amarwariro maingi againe obuheereza burungi omu ihanga ryona .
Okubaho kw'emyanya y'amagara omu mwanya nikitunguura omutindo gw'amagara g'abantu .
Amaduuka g'emibazi agamwe nigaguza abarwaire emibazi ehweireho .
Abarwaire baingi nibafeerwa amagara gaabo ahabw'okubura eshagama omu irwariro .
Abahikirweho akabi omu nguuto bari omu kabi k'amaani k'okufeerwa eshagama nyingi .
Omwebembezi ashabire abantu kuhayo eshagama kujuna amagara g'abantu .
Nikyetenga emotoka z'okutwara eshagama buri bwire obu kirikwetengyesa .
Banka y'eshagama omu ihanga neeshorooza eshagama rukumi kuruga omu bantu buri mwaka .
Omu bwire bw'okuzaara , abakazi abamwe nibetenga eshagama erikumara batakazaire n'enyima y'okuzaara .
Abamwe abarikuha obuheereza bw'eby'amagara nibakoresa kubi abantu omu miringo etari emwe n'emwe .
Abashaho abakazi obumwe nibatwarwa kubi abashaho abashaija abatari b'obukugu .
Oburemeezi bw'omutima oburikukira obwingi omu Uganda nibutwarwa omu mahanga agandi .
Abarikugaba eshagama nikibanguhira kutunga obuheereza bw'okuteebwamu eshagama kyaba nikyetengyesa .
Okuhayo eshagama nikiihaho eshagama nyingi omu mubiri kandi kigugumye amagara marungi .
Ni kikuru kugira emyanya y'okubiikamu eshagama omu disiturikiti zoona omu ihanga ryona .
Ekicweka ky'okubiikamu eshagama nikyetengyesa esente nyingi munonga kubaasa kutandikaho .
Abeebembezi b'eby'obuhangwa omu Uganda bashagikire munonga ekitongore ky'eby'amagara omu miringo etari emwe n'emwe .
Ebitongore ebitari bya gavumenti nibyejumba omu kutunguura obuheereza bw'eby'obujanjabi .
Okugira eshagama erikumara omu mubiri nikiguhwera kukora gye .
Orikukurira eby'amagara omu disiturikiti yaahabura abantu okukuratira obuyonjo eshaaha yoona .
Ba Minisita ba Gavumenti omu Uganda nibashashurwa gye waagyeragyeranisa n'abakozi ba Gavumenti abandi .
Abantu abamwe nibeejumba omu by'obutegyeki ahabw'esente kwonka ti ahabw'okuheereza .
Embariirira y'eihanga eshemerire kuguma neeta omutima aha nshonga nkuru ezirikuteganisa abaturagye .
Obuheereza bw'obwegyese omu kicweka kya bukiizi-bwa-bumosho bukyari ahansi waagyeragyeranisa n'ebindi .
Gavumenti eraganiise kwongyera aha mushaara gw'abashomesa omwaka ogurikuza kwija .
Abany'eishengyero nibatunga sente nyingi kuruga omu minisiture y'ebyesente buri mwaka .
Abaramuzi nibo bakozi ba gavumenti abarikushashurwa sente nyingi omu ihanga .
Abeebembezi tibashemereirwe n'omuringo ogu abantu barikuhakanisa ekiteiso kyabo ky'omushoro .
Abeebembezi b'ebyanga batandikire kutunga emishaara kuruga omu gavumenti buri kwezi kukira oku kyabaire kiri enyima .
Hariho okwerarikirira ngu abeebembezi abatoorainwe tibarikukira kugaruka omu bantu abu barikujwekyera .
Abashomesa nibo bari ahansi y'abakozi ba gavumenti omu Uganda .
Hariho amakampuni maingi g'eby'empurizana omu Uganda .
Emihendo y'okuteera esimu za kampuni ezimwe eri ahaiguru munonga waagyeragyeranisa n'ezindi .
Uganda ekataho empaka z'ensi yoona aha kishaayi kya Entebbe omwaka oguhwaire .
Golf n'omwe aha mizaano erimu abakunzi bakye omuri Uganda .
Obubonero nibubarwa buta omukazaano aka ?
Oine kutunga obubonero bwingi kubaasa kusinga omu mizaano .
Nikyetengyesa omuzaani orikukirayo kusinga omuzaano .
Empaka za Golf n'ez'abazaani ba Golf .
Golf n'omwe aha mizaano etarikukira kuzaanwa omu Uganda .
Abeebembezi ba Golf nibataho amaani g'okutunguura omuzaano gwa Golf .
Eminyeeto netendekwa kuzaana golf .
Hariho emizaano mingi oyihireho omupiira .
Buriijo nihaba hariho tiimu eine kusinga omu mpaka .
Empaka ezi niziza kutwara ebibiina bya golf ebirikurenga makumi mukaaga .
Okwehandikisa kw'abeejumbire omu mpaka za golf kuriyo nikugyenda omumaisho .
Purojekiti nyingi nizigyenderera kugasira eminyeeto .
Eminyeeto enyingi omu Uganda teine ​​mirimo .
Okuhinga eby'enyanja n'okuriisa eby'enyanja omu bidiba , omu bitanka n'ebindi .
Okuhinga eby'enyanja nikukorwa ahabw'ebigyendererwa by'obushuubuzi .
Purojekiti ezirikureeta sente n'entandikwa y'esente .
Ninteekateeka ngu buri mugurusi atwire ari omutsigazi aha rurengo rumwe omu magara .
Emyaka y'eminyeeto n'eha ?
Omwe aha myaka makumi ashatu n'etaano tarikutwarwa nk'omutsigazi .
Eminyeeto eshemerire kwetantara okunywa etaabe , okunywa amaarwa n'emibazi y'ekitabura bwonko .
Okuhinga ebirimwa nikukorwa aha itaka .
Obuhingi nibubaasa kukorwa aha rurengo rukye .
Purezidenti naheereza abakuru ba gavumenti abarikwesigwa .
Okuraganisa n'okuraganisa kukora ekintu .
Enguuto nizikorwaho haihi buri mwaka gw'esente .
Etara z'omu nguuto nizimurikira enguuto nyekiro .
Ebimwe ebi barikushaba tibiine kuhikiirizibwa .
Ebiconco nibiheebwa abo abu turikukunda .
Nitugura emibazi kuruga omu maduuka g'emibazi .
Ekitongore ky'eby'emibazi omu Uganda nikikora ki ?
Abakozi b'eby'amagara abaine ebisaanyizo bashemerire kutwara emirimo y'eby'amagara .
Amaduuka g'emibazi gaine kureebererwa kureeba yaaba emibazi ehingwireho n'ebindi .
Amaduuka g'emibazi maingi munonga gakingirwe omu myanya etari emwe n'emwe .
Abantu bamwe baitwa obwo barikugyezaho kureeta ebintu omu Uganda .
Omutindo gw'eby'amagara gukiri mubi omu Uganda .
Abashaho abatarikuhikiiriza ebisaanyizo tibashemerire kukora aha nshonga eziine akakwate n'eby'amagara .
Omuntu nayetenga orusa kuruga omu gavumenti kukora bizinesi omu Uganda .
Emyanya y'okushuuburiramu niyo eri ahagati y'emirimo ya bizinesi .
Hariho ebiragiro ebiriho ebirikutegyeka entwaza y'amagara g'abantu .
Amaduuka g'emibazi againe orusa nigakora omu mateeka .
Emibazi neekyeberwa eta ?
Abanyamakuru nibatutunga amakuru .
Amakampuni g'amakuru nigakozesa abanyamakuru .
Ebiragiro by'obushoboorozi nibikuratirwa .
Purezidenti agambire aha ndwara erikujanjaara munonga .
Omurimo gw'omunyamakuru ni guuha ?
Buriijo gyezaho kushoboorora enshonga orikukoresa ebiragiro .
Ebinyamakuru n'omuringo gw'okugaaniira ogurikukoresibwa kubiika n'okuhitsya amakuru .
Oburi bwenguzi buri haihi buri hamwe omu ihanga .
Okuha ripooti y'amazima n'enki ?
Twine okucondooza kw'omunda omu wiiki egi .
Okucondooza nikureeta omushana ebintu ebyakozirwe omu mwirima .
Ebigambo ebirikugambwa aha muntu nibibaasa kuba biri eby'amazima nari ebishuba .
Abanyamakuru tibashemerire kuba abarikweteekateekaho baaba nibakora emirimo yaabo .
Abakozi abaine enguzi bashemerire kucondoozibwaho gye .
Okuremwa kugaruza sente ezitari zaawe nikibaasa kukureetera obuzibu .
Engudo niziteebwa omu mbariirira haihi buri mwaka gw'esente .
Omubazi w'ebitabo omu Uganda n'oha ?
Ebitongore bya gavumenti nabyo biine obujunaanizibwa bw'okurwanisa oburi bwenguzi .
Nikirungi kushashura abakozi bwanyima y'okukora emirimo yaabo .
Pooriisi nayo neehwera omu kurwanisa oburi bwenguzi .
Ni murimo ki ogwa paramenti ?
Abakozi b'enguuto nibagura ebintu kuruga omu barikubaha obuheereza .
Okutebekanisa obwire butakahikire ni kikuru munonga .
Niki ekyabaire kiri omu ripoota y'eby'amagara ey'okwezi okuhweire ?
Ni mbeera ki ezi omuntu arikubaasa kurekurwa aha bondi ?
Omubazi w'ebitabo omukuru naabarira sente zoona ezi gavumenti erikukoresa buri mwaka gw'esente .
Amashomero g'okutendeka abashaho nigaha abashaho obukugu oburikwetengwa kukora omu by'obushaho .
Amazima nigahamibwa kuba amazima .
Aha muheru gwa purojekiti , tukaba twine kubara sente zoona .
Ripoota y'omubazi w'ebitabo neekorwa buri mwaka gw'esente .
Omurimo gw'omubazi w'ebitabo omukuru ni guuha ?
Okuha obujurizi bw'ebishuba omu kooti nikifubirwa omu mateeka .
Esente ezitarikumara nizibaasa kukyerereza emirimo .
Esente ezitaine akawunti zishemerire kugarurwa .
Ripoota y'omubazi w'ebitabo eine ebibuuzo bingi munonga .
Nikihikire amashomero kuguzibwa ahabw'emirimo endiijo ?
Ebishaayi nibitaayaayira enkumi n'enkumi z'abantu .
Iwe nk'omuny'eishengyero , omurimo gwawe niguuha ?
Abashuubuzi nibata sente omu purojekiti emwe ahabw'ekigyendererwa .
Amaka g'oburengyerwa-izooba nari oburengyerwa-izooba nigo garikukirayo oburungi .
Amakampuni kurabira omu bujunaanizibwa bw'abantu nigagarurira abantu .
Amashomero nigayetenga kugira emyanya y'okuzaaniramu abeegi .
Abakugu n'abantu abaine obukugu omu bi barikukora .
Kurabira omu bumwe , nitubaasa kutunga bingi .
Nikiba kitahikire okuteekateeka ngu abasiraamu boona n'abanyabuzaare .
Ekitongore ky'ahansi n'eitaagi rya kampuni enkuru .
Eitaka eri rihandiikirwe nk'ebibira .
Ebintu nk'eby'obugaiga bw'omu itaka byakoresibwa , nibibaasa kureetera eby'entaasya kutunguuka .
Omwaka gw'esente gwa Uganda nigutandika eizooba ry'okubanza okwezi kwa mushanju kuhisya ebiro makumi ashatu okwezi kwa mukaaga .
Obuhumbi bw'esente nizikoresibwa gavumenti buri mwaka .
Ebyanga ebirikutaayaayira empungi omu Uganda n'eby'omukago munonga .
Entebekanisa z'okwombeka ofiisi za disiturikiti ensya ziriho .
Madi n'emwe aha ndembo eziherize kuhangwa .
Okuhunama n'omwe aha mirimo egumire munonga ei omwebembezi aine kukora .
Abakozi ba gavumenti nibo bakuru abarikukirayo oburi bwenguzi .
Ntoroko ni disiturikiti erikukirayo oburi bw'enguzi omu Uganda .
Hashemerire kubaho obujunaanizibwa bwona aha sente za gavumenti .
Meeya akanga kuza omurukiiko rwa disiturikiti .
Ebyombeko omu ishomero nibihwera omu kutunguura embeera y'okwega .
Abeegi tibakatungire eby'okukoresa nk'ebyo kuruga obu eishomero ryaigurwa .
Abazaire baraganiise kwombeka ekibiina kimwe .
Enjura ku erikugwa , abeegi nibatunga obuhungiro omu kanisa eri haihi .
Okusheeshasheesha kw'ebishengye nikureetera abaana kugira emiteekateekyere mibi aha ishomero ryabo .
Gavumenti neyetenga kutebeekanisa amashomero ga gavumenti omu byaro ahonaaho .
Omushomesa akagira ngu abeegi bakamanyiira okushoma bataine by'okurya .
Abeegi bakatunga amaizi bwanyima y'ekishengye ky'ekibiina kutwarwa omuyaga .
Eishomero ryeitu rikaba riri aha runyiriri rw'amashomero aga gavumenti yaahaireyo sente z'okuhitsya omwaka ogu .
Eby'obugaiga by'omutindo murungi nibitunguura okukora kw'abeegi omu by'obwegyese .
Ni rimwe aha mashomero agarikukirayo kukora gye omu disiturikiti .
Amashomero maingi omu byaro nigakora ahansi y'emiti .
Akatangaara ahabw'okugira ngu ebipande by'ebyoma tibikahikire aha ishomero .
Omuny'eishengyero ariyo naayombeka ebitanda by'eishomero ryangye erya ira .
Ahabw'okuba eishomero rya gavumenti , gavumenti eine kuha ebikwato byona eby'okwega .
South Sudan eine enteekateeka y'okureeta amashanyarazi kuruga omu mahanga agagyehinguririize .
Nibaronda emiringo erikubaasa kubahwera kwebembera enkora y‘okucwamu ey‘ekyanga .
Hashemerire kubaho obumwe omu mahanga g'oburengyerwa-izooba bwa Afirika .
Bakyatebekanisa purojekiti egi .
Uganda esindikire amashanyarazi omu mahanga agamwe agari haihi .
Amashanyarazi gaheirwe omu kicweka kya West Nile .
Kampuni neija kuhwera omu kureeta amashanyarazi omu kicweka eki .
Ekyombeko ky'amashanyarazi nikiija kutandika kukora nyekiro .
Okutaho amashanyarazi makuru nikwija kukorwa omu kwezi kwa mushanju .
Arua hati ekwataniise n'obushoboorozi .
Etawuni z'aha nsharo haihi na Congo nazo zishabire okutaho amashanyarazi .
Entebekanisa ziriho z'okujanjaaza obushoboorozi omu kicweka ky'ensharo .
Omwebembezi w'ekyaro asiima munonga gavumenti .
Nikigumire abashuubuzi kwija omu kicweka haaba hatariho amaani .
Oyihireho enguuto ezihweire , amashanyarazi nago nigakuru munonga .
Amashanyarazi agarikwesigwa gashemereire kuhikirizibwa abantu omu matemba ga Uganda .
Omwebembezi w'ekyanga akoreirwe kureeba ngu purojekiti yaatunga obusinguzi .
Emiti y'amashanyarazi eshemerire kubyarwa omubwire bw'ekyererezi .
Amashomero nigariisa gye abeegi ?
Omu mwaka ogwo , emihendo ya sukaari ekeyongyera .
Eky'omu kasheeshe ekirimu amagara marungi nikihwera abeegi kukora gye omu mashomero .
Obworo nibukwata aha kukora kw'abaana omu kibiina .
Abeegi babaire bacumire aha nshonga y'okurya kyamushana .
Eky'omu kasheeshe kirimu n'esente z'okwega .
Okutunga eby'okurya ebirimu ebiriisa ni kukye .
Omwana naabaasa kurwara aremwe kuza omu ishomero .
Emihendo terikugwa juba bwanyima y'okutunguuka .
Abakuru b'eishomero bakagyezaho kushobororera abeegi oburemeezi oburi omuby'entaasya .
Abakuru b'eishomero bakozire orukiiko kugaaniira aha mbeera egi .
Eishomero niriheereza abeegi eby'okurya bya kyamushana n'eby'omu mwabazyo .
Omukuru w'eishomero akaba atamanyire abeegi abarikuguza ebintu byabo .
Abaana bashemerire kuheebwa kyansya ya busha ahaishomero .
Abeegi abaingi omu ishomero eryo nibashagikwa gavumenti .
Abanyamakuru bajumire okubinga bagyenzi baabo emirimo .
Eizooba eryo rikaheebwa ekitiinisa ahabw'okuhinga emiti obwire bwona .
Ebinyamakuru byakwata okukwatwa kw'omwe aha barikwenda entebe ya purezidenti .
Minisita aragiire ngu omunyamakuru owakwatsire ekigano eki bakwatwe .
Abanyamakuru abandi bareetaho okwetomboita ahabw'ensharamu ya minisita .
Ekitongore ky'eby'empurizana nikihinduka ekitongore ky'eby'obutegyeki ?
Tikirikukora makuru emikutu y'amakuru yaaba erekyeirwe kuhandiika amakuru agarikukwata aha by'obutegyeki .
Omurimo gwe n'okutegyeka ebirikugambwa abantu .
Abantu baine obugabe bw'okutunga amakuru .
Ebitebe bya tiivi bikaba bitafayo aha kurabura kwa gavumenti ngu batahandiika orukiiko rw'omwebembezi w'orubaju oruhakani .
Tihariho kiragiro ekirikuremesa abanyamakuru kukwata ebitebyo by'eby'obutegyeki .
Abantu nibeetomboita ahabw'ensharamu eyakozirwe omukuru w'akakiiko .
Uganda yatongoza akakiiko k'eby'amakuru akarikwetongora .
Omwebembezi asiimire abanyamakuru ahabw'okureetaho okumanyisa abantu .
Ebinyamakuru bikozire omurimo muhango omu kurinda obugabe bw'abaana kurabira omu kumanyisa abantu .
Hatariho kugaaniira , ensi neija kuba eri omu kabi , etaanisiibwe kandi eshoberwa .
Yabahiga kuhinga emiti mingi omwaka ogu .
Tiimu egi nezaana omupiira gw'omukago na tiimu kuruga omu nkambi eri haihi .
Omupiira gw'omupiira gw'ebigere guri ahagati y'eminyeeto n'abaana kuruga omu byaro .
Purojekiti egi neekora entunguuka omumyanya y'aheeru y'ensi yoona .
Purojekiti egi teri aha kutunga sente beitu n'okutunguura ebiconco by'omuzaani .
Kampuni egi ebaire neekwatanisa na kampuni ezindi zitari zimwe na zimwe .
Kurabira omumupiira , nibaija kwombeka omukago murungi ahagati y'eminyeeto kuruga omubicweka bitarikushushana .
Nibakozesa eby'emizaano kuha empungi ezito obushoboorozi .
Emizaano y'entunguuka n'obusingye neebaasa kuhindura amagara g'eminyeeto .
Emizaano ehwereire eminyeeto kwebwa okubonabona oku batungire omu rutaro .
Enshohoza ye ehindwiire omuringo gwabo gw'amagara .
Akatunga sikolashipu ahabw'okuba omuzaani w'omupiira orikukirayo omu kicweka .
Ekitongore eki nikitunguura okwega kwa dijitali omu Uganda .
Gavumenti neija kugurira abaana tablets omu mashomero ga gavumenti omukyaro kyaitu .
Eishomero eri naabaire ninshoma niryo ryabandize kutunga ebipande .

Okucondooza kwa poriisi nikukira kutwara obwire buraingwa kutakamanyisiibwe .
Amashanyarazi agashemeire kandi agarikugarukaho ni marungi omu kurinda eby'obuhangwa .
Ebiragiro bigumire bishemerire kuteebwa aha bakozi b'amakara .
Omuturagye wa buriijo tarikwetegyereza okutagata kw'ensi .
Abantu baine kumanyisibwa aha nshonga z'empindahinduka y'obwire .

Buri ka eshemerire kuhinga omuti gumwe kurwanisa empindahinduka y'obwire .

Emyanya y'empungi eshemerire kukyeberwa okwetantara okuguza abaana .
Eby'obuki nibikura kandi nibiija kuha eminyeeto emirimo .

Abariisa b'enjuki baine kutunga obukugu bwingi kubaasa kutunguura bizinesi .
Okubiika ebitabo n'obukugu bw'omugasho omu kukuratira oku bizinesi erikukora .

Okubiika obwoki nakyo nikikwata aha mutindo gw'obuki oburikuruga omu bwoki .
Okuriisa enjuki ti kigumire kwonka nikireeta amagoba .

Eminyeeto mingi eshemerire kwejumba omu kuhitsya obutumwa aha bantu .
Buri kiconco ekirikuheebwayo nikihwera omu kureeberera omwana w'empumi .
