Ebitongore by'abantu buntu bishemerire kurugayo bikashagika amaka g'abaana abatari bazaire .
Amakanisa maingi nigatandikaho amaka g'abafuuzi kuhwera abafuuzi omu byaro byabo .

Abashaija bashemerire kushagika omukundwa waabo baaba bari omu bwire bw'okuza omu micwe .
Hariho ebitebyo bingi ebirikukwata aha by'okuteerana ebirikukira kuhabisa eminyeeto .
Abaana b'emyaka y'obushogoyo nibetenga okwegyesibwa aha by'okuteerana kitakakyeire .
Okutwara enda omu myaka y'obukuru n'ekizibu kihango omu byaro .

Okukyebera kwa gavumenti buri kaanya ni kikuru kureeba ngu obuheereza bwaheebwa
Abahakani na gavumenti bakore hamwe omukuhereza obuhereza .
Abari omu ntebe nibakira kusinga akaruuru akarikukurataho ahabw'okukunda abantu .
Abantu baine kukuratira oku purojekiti za disiturikiti zirikugyenda .
Abarikuruga omu bibiina tibarikukira kumara obwire buraingwa omu bibiina byabo ebisya .
Okushoroora omu nganda n'okw'akabi omu by'obutegyeki ahabw'okuba nikureetaho okwebaganisamu .

Amashomero gaine kukira kugaruza busya ebishengye by'okuraaramu kubaasa kuboneza emyanya y'okuraaramu abeegi .

Obushuma bw'emibazi omu marwariro nibureetaho okubura emibazi .
Abakozi b'amarwariro abamwe nibashiisha eby'okukoresa kubaasa kwiba sente z'okugura ebintu bisya .
Amarwariro g'omubicweka nigakira kubura sente z'okukora emirimo yaago .
Abakuru abaingi abaine enguzi nibatunga omuringo gw'okuhunga oburingaaniza barikuziika obujurizi .
Abakuru b'amarwariro bashemerire kukora bingi kurwanisa oburi bwenguzi omu marwariro .
Ab'eby'amagara bashemereire kuba baine omukago murungi n'abantu abu barikuheereza .
Abantu tibarikwesiga abashaho abarikukora omu marwariro g'abantu .
Abakuru omuby'amagara baine kuguma nibakyeberwa kurwanisa oburi bwenguzi .
Nikirungi kutaho abakessi omu marwariro ga gavumenti kucondooza aha nguzi .

Abakuru omuby'amagara bashemerire kuhagira okurwanisa oburi bwenguzi omu marwariro .

Ebikwato ebiibirwe nibikira kugaruka kuguzibwa omu katare k'ebishuba .

Sikolashipu nyingi zishemerire kuheebwa abeegi abari omu bwetaago kutunguura abakozi baitu ab'eby'amagara .
Abeegi baine kwegyesibwa aha migisha etari emwe n'emwe ey'okutunga obuhwezi bw'okwega .

Abazaire baine omugasho omu kugaaniira aha kuhagira abeegi .
Okubura amakuru nikireetera okushaba kwa sikolashipu kukye omu byaro .
Obwegyese bwahaiguru nibutwara esente nyingi , ekirikureetaho okweyongyera kw'abaana abarikuruga omu mashomero .
Sikolashipu z'abeegi zishemerire kurangwa munonga kugira ngu hatagira owafeerwa .
Sikolashipu nyingi z'obwegyese bwahaiguru niziheebwa omu matendekyero ga gavumenti .
Abeegi b'omu byaro baine kuheebwa amakuru g'okutunga obuhwezi bw'okwega .

Abakwatsirweho batari bamwe na bamwe bagambire aha ku barikubaasa kuhandikisa abeegi baingi ahansi y'obuhwezi bw'okwega .
Eby'okurya birungi nibihwera abaana kukura n'okugira omuhimbo aha ishomero .
Ebyokurya ebirimu ebiriisa ni bikuru omu kukura kurungi kw'omwana .
Okweyongyera kwegyesa abazaire nikwetengyesa kushomesa aha kuriisa abaana kurungi .

Okumanyisa abantu buriijo n'omuringo gw'okumaraho okubura eby'okurya omu maka .
Okuriisa gye ni kikuru omu kushoma kw'omwegi .
Ebyokurya ebirimu puroteyini ni birungi aha kukura kw'omubiri kandi ni bikuru omu by'okurya ebirimu ebiriisa .
Purojekiti z'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa nk'okuriisa empunu zireebire ngu nizigasira abantu .
Hariho okutaana ahagati y'abantu abarikutuura omu tauni n'abari omu myanya ya hare .
Okutaayaayira abakazi abarikuzaara buriijo ni kikuru munonga aha bakazi abaine enda .

Okucondooza kushemerire kukorwa aha kubaasa kushoborora enshonga y'okubura eby'okurya .
Amafaamu g'okworeka gakahamibwa kuba ag'omugasho omu kucondooza aha by'obuhingi .
Ensimbi nyingi zishemerire kuteebwaho omu kucondooza aha by'obuhingi kureeba ngu eby'okurya byatunga .

Amaani maingi gaine kuteebwaho omu kushoboorora okubura eby'okurya omu byaro .

Obumwe ebintu ebiibirwe nibigarurwaho ab'obushoboorozi .

Abashuma bakwatsirwe aha poriisi .
Ebiragiro nibifubira abakozire ebibi .
Obwire bw'ekyererezi ti burungi aha nyamaishwa .
Waaba otakuratiire ebiragiro , noobaasa kukwatwa .
Otakagirira abakozi b’ebibi embabazi .
Amakuru g'okukunda ab'omuka nikimanyisa ki ?
Niki ekirikureetera omuntu kutwarwa nk'omuhangu ?
Abakugu baine obumanyirizi omu bi barikukora kandi baine ebipapura by'obwegyese .
Emigisha ya bizinesi neereetaho okutunguuka omu by'entaasya .
Waheebwa omurimo , oine kuba oyeteekateekire kukora .
Abanyabuzaare nibaha emirimo abo abari haihi nabo bonka .
Twena turi abantu , mbwenu reka tukundane .
Obumwe nibureetaho entunguuka .
Okubura obumwe nikibaasa kuremesa entunguuka .
Buri omwe aine ebi arikuteekateeka aha biro by'omumaisho .
Otagira ahonaaho kucwamu .
Nikyo kimwe abantu obutaikirizana aha kintu .
Amaani nigakorwa kutunguura okuheereza .
Ahabwenki abantu bashemerire kugumizamu nibeita kandi nibanyaga abandi ?
Obumwe abantu nibamanya abaturagye bagyenzi baabo abarikureetaho obutagira oburinzi omu kicweka .
Omukuru wa disiturikiti naareeberera emirimo aha rurengo rwa disiturikiti .
Abashaija b'amahe bariyo nibeeteeranira omu nkambi zaabo .
Ebyafaayo tibirikukira kwebwa .
Obugabe nibuija n'ebirungi bingi .
Omukuru w'amahe akaha orubazo rurungi munonga .
Obushuma n'okwita abantu nibireetaho obutagira oburinzi omu kicweka .
Omuntu aine kwikirizibwa omu mateeka kugira embundu omuri Uganda .
Pikipiki niziibwa juba .
Pooriisi neeha obujunaanizibwa bw'okurinda abarikuteekateekwaho .
Okujaguza oku kukaba kurimu amahe n'abantu ba buriijo .
Nitubaasa kutunguura tuta eby'okwerinda omu kicweka ?
Abantu nibakira kumanya ebintu bingi ebirikwetooroora .
Niki ekirikubaasa kushiisha obusingye bw’omuntu ?
Abanyarubanja tibarikwiba kwonka kureka nibatwara n'obusingye bw'abantu .
Ab'obushoboorozi bakaronda abo abaabaire nibaija kuba baine embundu omu muringo ogutari mu mateeka .
Guruupu z'abantu zitari zimwe na zimwe , omurundi gumwe , niziija kukora emirimo y'ekyanga .
Niki ekirikushangwa omu bikwato by'obuhwezi ?
Oburwaire bw'omu matu nibukira kubaho .
Yatunga obujanjabi kuruga aha mushaho nyomwebazyo .
Abafiire amatu nibabaasa kuhurira barikurabira omu bikwato by'okuhurira .
Omuntu orikuhurira naabaasa kwega kugamba .
Obutahurira nibubaasa kutambirwa .
Niki ekirikubaasa kureetera omuntu kufeerwa okuhurira kwabo ?
Ebikwato by'okuhurira bikozire eby'okutangaaza aha bifa-matu .
Oburemeezi obumwe nibubaasa kuhungurwa .
Ekikwato ky'okuhurira nikigura zingahi ?
Akaba atarikubaasa kukigura , kwonka haakiri akakitunga busha .
Abakaikuru n‘abagurusi nibafeerwa okuhurira ahabw‘emyaka .
Ni mitwarize ki ey'omuntu oine oburemeezi omu kuhurira ?
Owabaire naatwakiira omu muringo gw'ekitiinisa munonga .
Omuri Uganda , abashomesa omu mashomero ga gavumenti nibatwarwa omu mashomero agandi buri kaanya .
Abakozi nibakyeberwa buri kaire aha mirimo yaabo .
Abashomesa nibo barikujunanizibwa aha beegi abarikusinga .
Abashomesa bashemerire kukora ki kutunguura okukora kw'abeegi omu bwijwire ?
Ayetsire abanyamakuru omurukiiko rw'abanyamakuru nyenkyakare .
Abakuru b'abakozi baine kuguma baine omukago murungi n'abakozi baabo .
Abarwaire bashemereire kuguma haihi n'eirwariro .
Munyanyazi akakorera ekitongore ekyo kumara emyaka erikurenga makumi abiri .
Abashomesa nibaheereza ripooti omu mashomero kwegyesa abeegi .
Enkora z'okuhana ziteirweho kufubira abantu abaine obuzigu .
Abashomesa barikurenga makumi mushanju bakafururwa kuruga omu disiturikiti ya Kampala kuza omu disiturikiti ezindi omu Uganda .
Abakuru b'eby'obwegyese nibaija kuba nibareeberera amashomero obwire bwona kuruga hati .
Abakozi ba Gavumenti omu Uganda nibahumura aha mirimo ni myaaka engahi ?
Wahika aha myaka y'okuhuumura , noija kuba oine kuhayo ofiisi .
Abakozi basya bariyo nibashabwa kwijuza emyanya erimu abantu .
Emipiira neeteebwa ahansi y'itaka kuhwera omu kutwara amaizi omu bakozesa .
Amaizi nigaguma omu myanya y'amabaare n'ebibungo .
Obunabire ndi omukyaro , nkaba nteera amaizi g'ebiina .
Ebizibu ebimwe nibyetenga kushoboororwa ahonaaho .
Abantu omu tauni z'ahagati nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi .
Emyanya y'ensozi neekira kuba eine oburaingwa bwingi .
Hariho emiringo mingi y'okutunga amaizi .
Ekyanda nikikira kureetera okubura amaizi .
Twine kwikiriza kukora n'abandi twekundiire .
Amaizi aha pressure nkye nigasheesheka mpora .
Ab'eby'obutegyeki nibakira kuraganisa busha .
Ab'eby'obutegyeki bakye munonga nibo barikwesigwa .
Abakuru b'eihanga nibashoboorora ebizibu by'eihanga .
Abeebembezi nibabaasa kuhindurwa .
Abanyamakuru ikumi bonka nibo baizire omurukiiko rw'abanyamakuru .
Abeebembezi nibakunda kwenda kuguma omu bushoboorozi kumara obwire buraingwa .
Ab'eby'obutegyeki tibarikubaasa kwesigwa .
Ab'eby'obutegyeki nibaraganisa nk'omuringo gw'okuhamiza abateezi b'akaruuru .
Twine ebibiina bingi omu Uganda .
Okukiza n'okugarukana nibiha omuntu obusingye bw'omu mutima .
Ninteekateeka ngu n'obwire bwa Uganda kutunga obwebembezi busya omu by'obutegyeki .
Amahanga gashemerire kwegyera aha byahikire aha mahanga agandi .
Ekibiina ekyo tikirikumanyirwa omu disiturikiti .
Ekiro ky'okucungura ekibiina eki nikikuzibwa buri biro makumi abiri na mukaaga eby'okwezi kwa kabiri buri mwaka .
Ekibiina eki kimariire kusinga akaruuru omu bicweka ebingi .

Abantu nibeejumba omu mirimo y‘ekyanga .
Wamara kuraganisa oshemerire kuteeraho kuhikiiriza eki waraganiise .
Ekibiina eki kyajaguza emyaka makumi ashatu n'ena kuruga obu kyatandika .
Akaba ari omuny'eishengyero ahabwa disiturikiti egyo .
Omuny'eishengyero akatandikaho guruupu omu kicweka ekyo .
Purezidenti akabahabura ngu bahindure eiziina rya guruupu egi .
Abeebembezi b'ebyaro bashabire purezidenti kuhikiriza endagaano ye .
Guruupu nizetenga sente kukora gye .
Guruupu zitari zimwe na zimwe niziteebwaho kuhwera abaserukare aba ira .
Bashabire gavumenti kubahwera omu kutandikaho amakorero omu kicweka ekyo .
Esente ezirikweguzibwa zihwereire abakazi kutunguura embeera zaabo .
Amabanja n'omuringo mukuru gw'okutandika nari kwombeka bizinesi .
Omuntu naaba ata omunyamurwa ?
Hariho engambo ngu tarikubaasa kuhikayo kurabira omu bunyamurwa .
Hariho emyaka y'omuntu kuba omunyamurwa ?
Abanyamurwa tibarikubaasa kushwerwa bwanyima y’okuteebwaho .
Nkashemererwa mutabani wangye ku yaabaire omudiikoni .
Abantu okwetoroora disiturikiti yoona bakaija aha mukoro gwe .
Abazaire be bakahabura eminyeeto endiijo kukuratira ebigyere bya badiikoni .
Omwana we aine emitwarize mirungi kandi n’omushaija orikutiina Ruhanga .
Maama wangye n’Omukristaayo orikwehayo .
Ni Ruhanga ori ahaiguru ya baaruhanga boona .
Obunyamurwa n’okwetwa kuruga ahari Ruhanga .
Ruhanga niwe yantoorana kumuheereza , ti bantu .
Akahaburwa kuguma ari omwesigwa ahari Ruhanga .
Omu bwire bwona obw'okuteera akaruuru , amakanisa maingi nigabuurira eby'obutegyeki .
Yasiima abazaire be ahabw'okumwikiriza kwegaita aha bunyamurwa .
Abantu abaine endwara ya shukaari nabo nibabaasa kunywa obwoki .
Nikibaasa kureeta sente aha bariisa .
Abantu tibakareebaga okuriisa enjuki nk'oburugo bw'esente .

Ntwire ninriisa enjuki z'omugabekazi kumara obwire buraingwa .
Ebimera by'obuki nibireeta amaizi g'enjuki .
Omuntu ashemerire kurinda ebyobuhangwa .
Omuri Uganda obwoki oburikukirayo oburungi nibushangwa omuri Bushenyi .

Abakazi baingi nibo barikureeberera amaka erizooba .
Akaheebwa ebishaka bitaano by'enjuki z'omu kicweka .
Abakazi nibeejumba munonga omu kuriisa enjuki .
Gavumenti eheire obuhwezi abahikirweho omwegyemure ogwabaireho okwezi okuhwaire .
Ceyamaani wa disiturikiti atebekaniise omushomo gw'obwebembezi aha kitebe kikuru .
Empungi nizitunga oburemeezi bwingi omu myanya mirungi ei zirikutuuramu .
Ceyamaani waitu niwe muhwezi w'ekibiina ky'eminyeeto omu kyaro kyaitu .
Ofiisa akatuha obuhabuzi burungi aha kutandika kw'okutendekwa .
Omuntu otendekirwe naakora gye aha murimo kukira otaine bukugu .
Purojekiti y'abakazi ey'okuriisa enkoko ekagwa ahabw'obutakwatanisa omu ba memba .
Ebitongore ebimwe eby'esente nibiha amabanja n'amagoba maingi .
Akakiiko akakuru kakakozesa kubi esente za kiraabu .
Okutema emiti otaine ekindi nikishiisha eby'obuhangwa .
Disiturikiti yeitu ekatunga empungi nka magana ashatu omwaka oguhwaire .
Gavumenti ehereize ebigombe by'abakazi byona omu Uganda obuhwezi bw'esente .
Ninyebuuza ahabwenki omushoro gw'abakozi ba gavumenti gukyerereirwe okwezi oku .
Enguuto nyingi omu byaro ziri omu mbeera mbi .
Embariirira ya disiturikiti ey'omwaka ogu neija kushomwa wiiki erikwija .
Gavumenti yarabura abeebembezi kuha obujunaanizibwa bwona aha sente ezi batungire .
Kanso y'ekyaro kyaitu ekaba etaireho sente nyingi z'okutunguura eby'amagara .
Emishoro neehwera omu sente z'entunguuka y'eihanga buri mwaka .
Gavumenti eyongyeire emishaara y'abakozi b'eby'amagara kutandika okwezi okurikwija .
Ensimbi eziteirweho tizirikumara kuhezaho okuboneza oruguuto .
Engudo mbi nizireetaho akabi k'okutunga butandu z'emotoka .
Abantu abarikufeerwa eitaka omu nkora y'okugaita enguuto buriijo nibarihirirwa .
Gavumenti neeta sente nyingi omu mirimo y'abantu buri mwaka .
Ekicweka kihango ky'eihanga tikiine nshozi z'amaizi marungi .
Gavumenti eshemereirwe ahabw'entuura y'amaizi ensya erikushashurwa gavumenti .

Foomu y'okushaba n'enki ?
Twine orukiiko rw'ahonaaho erizooba .
Ninkora nta akawunti ya banka ?

Nituhandiika tuta ebaruha y'omutaano ahari Mukuru w'eishomero ?
Abanyamurwa bashemerire kuba nibajunaanizibwa aha sente ezibaheirwe .
Obujunaanizibwa bw'enkora bukaheebwa akakiiko akarikuhabura .
Abazaire baine kutunga obujunaanizibwa bw'ebishare by'eishomero .
Ekanisa neija kureeberera ebishare by'amashomero g'empumi .
Emigyenzo n'emitwarize y'eminyeeto biine kurindwa .
Okwegyesa aha by'okuteerana kushemerire kwegyesibwa omu mashomero .
Abaana b'amashomero nibenda kumanya bingi bwanyima y'okwegyesibwa aha by'okuteerana .
Ba ssenga ba taata nibakora omurimo muhango omu kwegyesa aha by'okuteerana .
Abeebembezi b'ebika bashemerire kwegyesa eby'okuteerana omu mashomero .
Nikizira kugamba aha bicweka by'omubiri omu buhangwa obumwe .
Okugamba kukaheebwa ahagati y'enteerane z'obunywani .
Embaririra yoruzaaro eshemerire kwegyesibwa omu mashomero .
Okujanjaara kwa siriimu omu bashwereine nikureetwaho obutaikirizana .
Abakwatsirweho bashemerire kwebuuzibwaho enteekateeka etakatandikire kuta omu nkora .
Abeebembezi b’ediini bashemerire kubuurira obwesigwa omu bushwere .
Abashomesa ba Biology nabo nibeegyesa eby'okuteerana omu mashomero .
Abeebembezi b'obuhangwa bashemerire kugira eki baakora omu kwegyesa ahaby'okuteerana .
West Nile ekaba eine abeebembezi b'amaani .
Konsitityushoni ekahindurwa .
Ebitongore by'obuhangwa bikagaruka byateebwaho .
Engudo ziheirweyo kwombekwa .
Engudo ezi ziheirweyo kampuni y'aheeru y'ihanga kwombeka .
Esente zikatunga okutandika okwombeka .
Oruguuto oru rwaheebwayo omukozi w'okwombeka .
Engudo niziija kwombekwa n'ebitaara by'omu nguuto .
Amatemba ga Uganda gatungire omu puroguramu y'okwombeka .
Munisiparite ekatunga sente z'okutunguura ebyombeko .
Bakakozesa sente z'okwombeka enguuto .
Nibombeka ekishaayi kya takisi eky'omurembe .
Nibetenga kukora hamwe kuheza purojekiti .
Purojekiti y'enguuto n'ey'abantu ti gavumenti .
Abantu boona nibahaburwa kwikiriza purojekiti egi .
Abantu boona nibahaburwa kukora hamwe na ba konturakita .
Okwombeka oku nikugyendererwaho okutunguura orurembo .
Nibaija kutandika okwombeka barikushara emiti .
Esente ezi niziija kukoresibwa omu purojekiti z'enguuto .
Omukuru w'eishomero akahayo ebaruha ye y'okurekura .
Tibaraikirizaine aha sente z'amashomero .
Tiimu egi etungire sente omu muringo ogutari mu mateeka .
Bashabirwe kushashura omushoro .
Eiziina rya purojekiti rikakoresibwa omu muringo ogutari mu mateeka .
Esente niziija kuza aha akawunti y'eishomero .
Tiimu eyangire kwikirizana aha akawunti ei barikuza kutwara sente .
Hakaba hariho okugyemeserezibwa kutandika kwombeka enguuto .
Abashomesa bajunaana abeegi ahabw'okujanjaaza engambo ezitahikire .
Omukuru w'eishomero akakoresa kubi esente ezi babahaire .
Omuzaire akashaba omukuru w'eishomero kuhindura aha biteekateeko byabo .
Abakuru b'amashomero bashemerire kutunga abakozi baingi ahabw'okutegyeka gye .
Ambulensi ezi zikwatsirwe ahabw'okushashura omushoro .
Ambulensi ezi ziguriirwe abakazi abaine enda .
Bakama ba ambulensi baine kubanza bashashura omushoro batakazikozeise .

Akagambirwa ngu okugura ambulensi tikurikushashurwa omushoro .

Akaraganisa ngu naija kumuihaho emishoro ye yoona .

Abashomesa bashemerire kuguma nibafayo aha mitwarize yaabo baaba bari omu bibiina .

Abazaire bakaba nibeebuuza ahabwenki abaana baabo bakozire kubi .
Nabaasa kufeerwa akaruuru .
Aine obujunaanizibwa bwingi munonga .
Bashabire sente z'okutebeekanisa omukoro ogu .
Abantu b'omukyaro bakagambirwa aha ssemateeka .
Ogu akaruga omukihome nyomwebazyo .

Esente ezi zitwaire obwire buraingwa kushohora .

Abeegi nibashabwa kuguma omu mashomero kugira ebiro by'omumaisho birungi .
Abaishiki omuri Uganda abari ahagati y'emyaka mukaaga kuhika ahari ikumi n'ebiri tibakashogaga ah'ishomero .
Abeebembezi b'ebyaro bashabire abazaire kushagika abaana baabo omuby'obwegyese .
Okugyemeserezibwa kw'abaishiki nikureetera abamwe kutwara enda bakiri bato .
Ebyanga ebimwe bizibiire ebishengye by'okushemererwamu ahabw'ebikorwa by'obushambani .
Okutongana aha itaka kukanyire munonga omu Uganda erizooba .
Eishengyero rya Uganda rikataho disiturikiti ensya .
Paramenti nayo ekataho amagomborora masya .
Hariho entaro ahagati y'abeebembezi b'ebyanga omu kyaro kyaitu .
Owabaire naamuhakanisa akamujunaana ebishuba .
Kurabira omu karuuru , abantu nibaija kutoorana omwebembezi ou barikwenda .
Abashabire kureeta obuhame bw'ebi barikumugambira .
Obwahati , niwe mukazi orikwebembera disiturikiti ibiri .
Abantu omukicweka kyaitu bashemerire kutuura hamwe nk'omuntu omwe .
Ekicweka kubaasa kugira okutunguuka omu by'entaasya , haine kubaho enkwatanisa omu batuuzi .
Abeebembezi bashemerire kugira embabazi omugati yaabo n'abantu abu barikwebembera .
Omwebembezi omukazi akatuhiga kukora hamwe ahabw'enshonga mpango .
Abeegi bashemerire kutunga okumanya aha kushomesa eby'okuteerana .
Hariho omubaro muhango gw'abaana abarikuruga omu mashomero gaitu erizooba .
Obworo ni kimwe aha bintu ebirikureeta abaana kuruga omu mashomero omu Uganda .
Buriijo tushemerire kuhiga abaana kuguma omu mashomero .
Hariho okushoroora omu bwegyese bw'abaishiki omuri Afirika .
Ekitongore eki nikishomesa abaana aha kwetantara n'endwara z'obushambani .
Abaishiki abamwe nibatiina kugambira abazaire baabo aha by'okuteerana .
Omushomesa akahabisa omwishiki omuby'okuteerana , arikumuraganisa kumugurira eby'okukoresa omu ishomero .
Nitubaasa kukyendeeza obutabanguko omu baana bato ?
Ndyahwera muhara wangye kuhikiiriza ebirooto bye .
Aha ishomero , omukazi mukuru akatwegyesa oku turikubaasa kuta ebitanda byaitu .
Hariho ebigambo ebi abashomesa batashemerire kugambira abeegi baabo .
Omukazi mukuru omu ishomero naahwera abaishiki kusingura oburemeezi oburikureetwaho okuza omu micwe .
Abazaire nibashwera abahara baabo abato omu mwanya gw'omuhendo gw'omugore .
Entebekanisa z'amagara g'amashomero ziyambire omu kurinda abakaikuru/abagurusi omu mashomero .
Okukozesa kasasiro n'ekimwe aha bizibu by'obuhangwa ebiri omu rurembo Kampala erizooba .
Kasasiro neetorotoorwaho omu maka gaitu buri wiiki aha sente ezi twaikirizaineho .
Etawuni etebekanisiibwe eine kuba eine omwanya muhango gw'okushorooramu kasasiro .
Orikukurira eby'amagara omu disiturikiti yarabura abaturagye aha kusheenya kasasiro kubi .
Abeebembezi ba kanso z'ebyanga bateireho eizooba ry'okuboneza buri saabiiti .
Kanso eteireho ebiina bya kasasiro omu myanya yoona okurinda obuyonjo .
Kanso ekapangisa emotoka z'abantu buntu kutunguura omuringo gw'okushoroza kasasiro .
Abakuru ba kanso abamwe nibakoresa omugisha gw'embeera ahabw'okwenda kutunga ebirungi .
Abataka bajunaana kansara wa tauni ahabw'okukyerererwa kushorooza kasasiro .
Abakuru ba kanso bafubiire abantu abarikunaga kasasiro omu miferere y'enguuto .
Abakozi b'akatare nibo barikukora ahari buri kimwe otwariremu n'okushorooza kasasiro .
Orukiiko rw'ediini n'ekitongore ekirikugaita abeebembezi b'ediini zoona omu Uganda .
Omusiraamu aine kukora orugyendo orurikwera kuza Mecca kubaasa kwetwa Hajji .
Obwire bw'okusiiba kw'abasiraamu nibwetwa Ramadhan .
Ibrahim niwe ishe abaikiriza boona omu byafaayo by'ediini .
Amaka goona ag'abasiraamu gaine kushara enyamaishwa aha izooba eri .
Gavumenti neehayo ebinyonyi n'omuceeri aha basiraamu omu ihanga ryona .
Abashaija abasiraamu nibaikirizibwa kushwera abakazi abarikurenga ahari omwe .
Obutakwatanisa tiburikurugamu karungi omu magara g'abantu .
Twena turi bamwe omu kishushani kya Ruhanga .
Hariho enkoragana nungi na Uganda n'amahanga agandi .
Ni mugyenzo gw'ediini abasiraamu kugabana enyama aha kiro kya Eid .
Eid neekuzibwa buri mwaka .
Ni kirungi okukundana .
Yahayo eby'okurya aha bakuzire n'abaine oburema .
Eby'obutegyeki bireetsireho okurwanagana ahagati y'ebicweka ebi byombi .
Akakiiko ka disiturikiti kakateekateeka aha kugaita akatare ka rwagati .
Hariho okweyongyera kw'abantu abarikwirukira omu rurembo orukuru .
Eitaka eri niribaasa kuhingamu .
Omugaiga omu tauni yaitu akahayo eitaka ry'okwombekyeramu enkambi .
Nkakwatanisa na ba kasitoma bangye kubaasa kutunga emigisha mingi y'okukora bizinesi .
Entunguuka y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ereetsireho okutunguuka kw'eby'entaasya omu tauni yaitu .
Abantu baingi nibaruga omu byaro n'omu faamu kuza omu ndembo .
Emyanya etari emwe n'emwe eshangirwe eri nungi y'okufurukiramu .
Bakafururwa omu itaka rihango .
Hariho ekitebe kisya kya poriisi omumwanya gwaitu gw'okushuuburiramu .
Okufuruka oku nikuteekateekwaho kutwara ameezi nka ana .
Enkora y'okufuruura enkambi z'amahe ni ndeingwa munonga .
Hariho obutaikirizana ahagati ya disiturikiti ibiri ezirikutaayaayira empungi .
Nihaija kubaho obutaikirizana omu by'entaasya omu kicweka .
Ebiro ebi abantu nibatwara ebiragiro omu mikono yaabo .
Abashagiki b'ebibiina ebirikuhakanisa gavumenti ebitari bimwe na bimwe nibarwaana .
Hariho okweyongyera kw'oburingaaniza bw'ekigombe ky'abantu omu tauni yaitu .
Pooriisi eriyo necondooza ekyaretaho enshonga egi .
Abeebembezi abamwe nibeyendeza kandi nibateekateeka aha kuhazya enshaho zaabo zonka .
Abahikirweho oburingaaniza bw'ekigombe ky'abantu batungire obujanjabi kuruga omu irwariro rikuru omu kicweka eki .
Ekicweka kyaitu kiine ambulensi emwe etarikubaasa kutwara oburemeezi bwona obw'ahonaaho .
Abeebembezi aba bombi bakaba baine obutaikirizana bwabo .

Disiturikiti egi niyo erimu empungi nyingi .

Hariho okweyongyera kw'obworo ahabw'endwara ya Coronavirus .
Nooha oine kujunaanizibwa ahabwa butandu ezirikureetwa enguuto mbi ?
Hati hahingwireho emyaka ikumi kuruga obu baahererukayo kukora aha nguuto .
Kampuni etungire ebyoma bisya by'okwombeka enguuto .
Kurabira omu beebembezi baitu , tuketomboita ahabw'ebyombeko bibi omu tauni yaitu .
Oruguuto oru niruza omu tauni kandi nirukoresibwa abashuubuzi baingi .
Engudo zirimu ebiina bingi ebirikubaasa kureetera butandu y'amaani .
Akagyezaho kwetantara ekiina kandi yateera omushaija aha pikipiki .
Abeebembezi nibo baine kujunaanizibwa ahabw'okuhindura sente ezaabaire zitebeekanisiibwe purojekiti egi .
Omwebembezi omukazi ariyo nayebembera okwesharinga arikurwanisa enguuto mbi omu tauni yaabo .
Engudo mbi nizireetera butandu buri izooba .
Titurikubaasa kuba abahuuku omu ihanga ryeitu .
Okuboneza enguuto nikwija kutandika okwezi okurikwija .
Omuntu ku arikukora purojekiti , ashemerire kuteekateeka aha bwire bw'okuhindura purojekiti .
Minisita yajumirira abakozi ahabw'ebyoma ebibi ebyakozesiibwe omu kwombeka .
Omwebembezi niwe ayebembeire okwesharinga kw'okushutama omu tauni .
Abantu bakaba nibayomba kandi barikurwana .
Yagira ngu eminyeeto kuruga aharubaju oruhakani niyo eyebembeire obutabanguko obu .
Omwebembezi akaba atebeekaniise sente z'okuhayo ekibiina ky'abakazi .
Ekibiina ky'abanyarujungu eki nikigira ngu kikatumwa abeebembezi b'orubaju oruhakani .
Ebintu bingi n'ebyombeko bikacwekyerezibwa omu bwire bw'okwesharinga .
Eminyeeto ey'obushaarizi eyokize emotoka erimu ebikondo by'amashanyarazi .
Eminyeeto etaano ekwatsirwe kandi yakomwa .
Eminyeeto egi eine ekiniga ekanyaga ebintu kuruga omu maduuka g'abantu .
Abeebembezi b'orubaju oruhakani bahakanisa ebigambo by'okuhabisa eminyeeto omu butabanguko .
Akakwatwa ahabw'okwebembera okwesharinga .
Omwebembezi yayanga ebigambo byona .
Omubwire bw'okwesharinga , ceyamaani w'ekyaro akateerwa amasasi omu butanwa .
Tindikwikiririza ngu na munyanyazi naabaasa kunrwanisa .
Pooriisi ekaba nemanya orukwe rw'eminyeeto orw'okwesharinga .
Eminyeeto 18 bakwatsirwe ahabw'okwebembera obutabanguko obu .
Etawuni eyakwatsirweho omubwire bw'okwesharinga niyo erikutunga empungi nyingi .
Okwesharinga kukatandika obu omwebembezi w'orubaju oruhakani yaabaire ari aheeru y'orurembo .
Omwebembezi akaba naarwanirira obugabe bw'abantu omu rurembo orwo .
Abaserikare bakwata ebintu byabo kandi tibiribagarurwa .
Aha Sande ebitanda nibikingirwa kandi abashuubuzi nibagyemeserezibwa kusheesha omu itaka .
Orurembo ruhaire emyanya y'okuguzamu ebintu aheeru y'orurembo , kwonka bakayanga .
Ekitongore ky'okurinda ebiragiro omu rurembo nikikwata ebintu kuruga omu bashuubuzi .
Tikiri ky'oburingaaniza kubinga abashuubuzi b'aha nguuto , tibaine ahu barikukora .
Okuguza ebintu aha nguuto nigwo muringo gwonka ogu barikubaasa kuhweramu amaka gaabo .
Abashuubuzi aha nguuto beeteekateekire kuza omu katare akasya .
Ab'obushoboorozi omu rurembo batandikireho ebikorwa aha bashuubuzi b'aha nguuto abarikukora omu muringo ogutari mu mateeka .
Entebekanisa mbi y'orurembo neebaasa kureetera omwanya mukye gw'okukoramu bizinesi .
Omwebembezi murungi ashemerire kuba ekyokureberaho omumirimo ye y'obutegyeki .
Abashuubuzi omu katare omu tauni yeitu bakakora ekibiina ky'okubiika esente okwezi okuhweire .
Ekimwe aha bintu ebirikuhwera omu kutunguura omwanya n'obukuumi burungi .
Omukoro gw'okurahiza kwa ceyamaani wa disiturikiti omusya gubaireho nyomwebazyo .
Omu bizibu ebikuru ebiri omu disiturikiti harimu obuheereza bw'eby'amagara obubi .
Omwe aha beebembezi b'orurembo rwaitu akaba ari omu ofiisi kumara emyaka makumi abiri .
Omushaija ashazire mutaahi we omukono bwanyima y'okutongana ahabw'ensharo z'itaka ryabo .
Okugira embundu otaine rusa rwa gavumenti nikihenda ebiragiro .
Abeebembezi bakata omukono aha ndagaano y'obusingye kumaraho okusheesha eshagama omu bantu baabo .
Pooriisi ekwatsire ekibinja ky'eminyeeto eyateera bagyenzi baabo omu kicweka kyabo .
Abaturagye bataahirira omugaiga owaabaire nagyezaho kutwara ekicweka ky'itaka ryabo .
Amahanga againe obwebembezi bubi nigasigarira enyima omu ntunguuka .

Akakiiko ka disiturikiti kakatebeekanisa obugyenyi bw'okusibura ceyamaani .
Minisita w'eby'amagara niwe yaba omugyenyi mukuru aha mukoro ogu .
Emyaka mikye enyima , Ebola ekaita abantu baingi omu matemba ga Uganda .
Nkahurira abantu barikugira ngu Ebola nejanjaara ahabw'enkyende .

Abantu abamwe nibabuzabuza endwara z'obushaho n'oburogo .

Okwesharinga kw'abeegi kureetsireho okucwekyerera ebintu by'amashomero
Omukuru w'eishomero omusya omu ishomero ryaitu erya gavumenti atunguukire omu mitwarize y'abeegi .

Amashomero goona omu kicweka kyaitu gatungire emeeza makumi ataano kuruga omu gavumenti wiiki ehweire .
Amashomero nigabinga abeegi abamwe ahabw'emitwarize yaabo mibi .
Omureeberezi ashabire abashomesa kworeka eky'okureeberaho kirungi aha beegi .
Akakiiko akarikuhana eishomero kakafubira omwegi ahabw'okutaheereza abashomesa ekitiinisa .
Amashomero nigatebeekanisa abasingire omu bigyezo by'eihanga eby'omwaka ogurikuza kwija .
Kanso y'ekyanga neekora kyona ekirikubaasika kureeba ngu ekyaro kyaitu kyaguma kitebeekanisiibwe gye .
Abashuubuzi tibashemereirwe n'esente z'okupangisa omu butare bw'omu rurembo .
Gavumenti etaireho obutare bw'omurembe omu tauni empango .
Abakuru omu rurembo bakwatsire ebintu by'omushuubuzi ogu aha nguuto erizooba .
Abaine bizinesi baine obujunaanizibwa bw'esente bwingi obu baine kuhikiiriza buri izooba .
Abashuubuzi bashatu omu katare bakwatsirwe ahabw'okuhenda ebiragiro by'ekitongore .
Ab'obushoboorozi omu rurembo bahaire abashuubuzi ameezi abiri kuruga omu nguuto .
Abakazi abashuubuzi beetomboitiire abakuru b'akatare ahabw'okugaaniira aha kaabuyonjo n'abashaija .
Obumwe kanso y'orurembo neekyerererwa okutorotoora kasasiro kuruga omu butare .
Obutare nibwetenga abakuumi okuzibira abashuma kwiba ebintu by'abantu .

Kanso y'orurembo ekingire obutare bwingi ahabw'ebitanda bitari birungi .
Akatare k'omukicweka nikaguza ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe aha muheendo mukye .
Obutare bw'omukicweka tiburikushoroora ahagati y'abagaiga n'abooro .

Abantu bakatema emiti mingi ahabw'emirimo y'okwotsya amakara .

Nikigumire kutunguuka otaine bwengye burungi bw'eby'esente .
Abantu abamwe omu Uganda tibarikumanya oku barikukora embariirira y'entasya zaabo .
Obumanyi obutungirwe buyambire omu kutunguura omutindo gw'amagara g'abantu .
Emiringo y'obusingye ey'okushoboorora obutaikirizana neekira okukoresa amaani .
Ekitongore ky'eihanga eky'amaizi nikiha amaizi marungi omu ihanga ryona .
Abantu abaingi omu byaro nibakitaha amaizi kuruga omu biziba .
Ekitongore ky'eihanga nikishashura sente z'okutaho amaizi n'okugakozesa .
Okubaho kw'amaizi nikubaasisa abantu kuguma baine obuyonjo .
Emirimo mingi ey'omuntu ahabwe neeyenda amaizi .
Tiimu z'abaziguzi b'omuriro ba poriisi ziine emyanya mingi y'okushoroozamu amaizi omu rurembo rwona .
Akakiiko k'entunguuka kyombekire ebiina by'okutimba omu disiturikiti yoona .
Tihariho sente z'okushashura abakozi .
Besharingire ahabw'okukyerererwa kushashura .
Ofiisa wa poriisi nawe akwatsirwe .
Ekigombe ky'abantu kikaba kiri haihi kwita omuserikare .
Akateerwa emotoka y'emigugu .
Eki kibaireho omu mwabazyo gutakahikire .
Abataka beesharinga ahabw'okuheereza kubi .
Abarikuteekateekwaho kushiisha eiziina ry'ekyaro .
Bajunwa poriisi .
Abarikuteekateekwaho kuba bari omu mikono ya poriisi .
Yayanga ngu akakora n'abarikuteekateekwaho .
Abashuma abaine eby'okurwanisa bakaba nibakora nyekiro .
Nibaija kukorwaho poriisi .
Ahabwenki bamutwaire omu kooti y'amahe ?
Orikuteekateekwaho akareebeka nk'orikushaba okusaasirwa .
Batunga obujanjabi kuruga omu irwariro eri haihi .
Lori egi ekaba eine amaarwa n'emibazi y'ekitabura bwonko .
Okukora waragi kukakyeenwa omu Uganda .
Eki kikakorwa kutunguura eby'okukora omu kyanga .
Amaarwa gaine akabi aha magara g'abandi .
Pooriisi ekahaburwa ngu etakwatanisa n'enshonga egi .
Kansara akegyesa abantu akabi akari omu kunywa amaarwa .
Obusinzi nibureeta okufa omu minyeeto .
Ebiragiro bikateebwa omu nkora ahabw'omuporiisi .
Ebintu ebikwatsirwe nibibiikwa nk'obuhame .
Abantu boona tibashemerire kutwara enshonga omu mikono yaabo .
Orikujunaanwa naija kutwarwa omu kooti z'ebiragiro .
Bakaba baine kutunguura omutindo gw'amagara g'abaturagye .
Ebiragiro nibiteebwa omu nkora omu disiturikiti zitari zimwe na zimwe .
Enkambi y'empungi n'ey'akabi aha bandi abatuuzi .
Enkambi eri omu matemba ga disiturikiti .
Esente zishohoziibwe kushagika enkambi y'empungi .

Nikiija kumanyisa eishengyero ebiteekateeko byabo aha nshonga nkuru .
Okuhisya enkumi ibiri na mukaaga , ebibiina by'obutegyeki bikakyemerezibwa kwigura amataagi .
Kandi tibarikufayo aha mazima agandi agarikuteekateekwaho .
Erizooba , omuntu nabaasa kureeba ebendera z'ekibiina zirikuguruka ahaiguru aha ofiisi z'omubicweka .
Ebendera z'ekibiina n'akamanyiso k'emirimo y'ekibiina .

Hariho ebintu bishatu eby'okwijuka aha .

Kikaba kiine obusinguzi n'eihe eryabaire nirireebeka nk'ery'amaani .
Abanyamurwa baayo bakahunga omu maisho g'abantu abu baabaire nibategyeka kumara obwire buraingwa .
Ebyafaayo by’eihanga ebihererukireyo nibyoreka akamanyiso k’okutiina akarikuteekateekwaho .
Eihanga ryijwire obwoba .
Enju ye ekaba eri omu mwanya gutahikire omu bishengye bingi ebiri enyima y'ebigo bihango .
Enju n'ekirooto kya buri muntu mukuru omunya Uganda .
Ebicweka makumi ataano na munaana ahari igana eby'obupangisa kandi obupangisa omu Uganda buri ahaiguru munonga .
Ebicweka makumi abiri na mushanju ahari igana byonka nibipangisa amaju makuru .
Obupangisa nibugura sente nkye munonga nk'oku omuntu arikuruga omu myanya mikuru .
Kwonka , obupangisa bukyari ahaiguru kukira ahandi omu kicweka .
Aho niho ekyetengo ky'okugira enju kirikutandikira .
Omuringo ogu nigushekyererwa nk'ogw'omurembe gwa ira .
Abarikukora amaju n'eitaka nibenda ngu abarikutunga sente bairukye baze omu banka kutunga omugabo .
Omwe agura eitaka kandi ayombeka aha sipiidi yaabo ataine kugyemeserezibwa .
Ekibi kiri ngu abantu bakye nibo barikubaasa kutunga sente ezirikwetengyesa kwombeka enju .
Ekicweka ky'okwombeka n'okuguza amaju kikaba kireebire okutunguuka kwingi .
Emihendo y'ahaiguru etari y'oburyo ereetsireho okushohoza omu bwire obu .
Omuringo ogurikukunda munonga ogw'okushohoza amaju agombekirwe kurabira omu kuha sente z'okugura enju hati nigukunda munonga .
Ebintu by'okugura enju bisherekirwe , nibikyerererwa kukora , kandi tibirikuhikaana n'akatare .
Abaingi aharibo nibeekorera .
Ofiisi ya Prime Minister na Purezidenti nibagabana ekicweka ky’esente z’okugaruza abantu omu maka gaabo .
Batungire kumanya entebeekanisa kurabira omu bihandiiko by'amakuru .

Amakampuni g'amasimu nigashashura abandi ahabw'okuteera esimu aha mikutu etari emwe n'emwe .

Abarikukozesa esimu z'omu ngaro abaingi bari aha nkora ya Safaricom .

Ekigyendererwa kikaba kiri okuremesa okuteera esimu aha mikutu endiijo .
Nikitegyeka ebicweka nka nkaaga ahari igana eby'akatare .
Bakaba nibaija kushashura esente nyingi ahari buri kuteera esimu .

Okuraba omu itaka nikwija kuba esente z'okuhendera ahu orikuza .

Okuteera esimu aha mikutu endiijo nikwija kushashurwa shiringi magana ashatu na makumi ana .

Nootandika ryari ekiro kyawe ?

Oku orikubaasa kuteisa aha kintu kyona n'omuntu weena hoona omu nsi yoona
Endagiiriro egi neeha abashomi amakuru g‘okuteisa n‘obukugu n‘okwanguha .
Ekitabo eki kitebeekanisiibwe kurugiirira aha kicweka , nikiha ebirikukwata aha bizinesi za buri ihanga .
Nikiha okumanya kw'omugasho aha nshonga nungi z'okuteisa .
Okukora bizinesi omu mwanya gw'aheeru y'eihanga buriijo nikiba kigumire .
Okwetegyereza kwe nikwija kuba okw'omuhendo omu mbeera yoona .
Okuteisa n'obukugu obukuru obu turikwetenga kugira .
Abaana baine kuhaburwa baaba nibeegaita aha ishomero risya .
Ni kikuru kumanya obushoboorozi bw'omwana .
Enziga ku zitarikuhikaana gye , nikireetera emipiira kujura juba .
Eki nikireetaho esente ezitarikwetengyesa aha kuhindura emipiira .
Enziga ezitarikushushana nizireetera oburemeezi omu kuguma kw'emotoka .
Kandi nikireetaho oburemeezi omu kuvuga n'okuvuga .
Enshonga ezi zoona nizireetera okutereeza enziga kuba kikuru .
Emipiira erikwetenga kuhindurwa neebaasa kureetera emotoka obuzibu bw'okwerinda .
Nangwa n'enziga ezitarikwetenga kuhindurwa nizibaasa kureetera oburemeezi .
Abavugi baine kutwara oburyo bw'okurinda emipiira n'emipiira yaabo .
Abantu baingi nibabuzabuza okuteerana kw'enziga n'okugyeragyeranisa enziga .
Okutereeza enziga nikitwariramu okureeba ngu enkokora z'enziga zahindurwa .
Okugyeragyeranisa n'okuhakanisa byombi biine kukorwa buriijo .
Okuteerana kw’emotoka nikutwariramu ebicweka byona eby’emotoka ebirikureetera emotoka kugyendera gye .
Ekimwe aha bicweka byayo kyaba nikyetengyesa kubonezibwa , emotoka teine ​​bukuumi bw'okuvuga .
Ebipimo ebi nibyetwa caster , camber , na toe .
Abafirika butoosha nibasinga omu mpaka z'emotoka .
Endangamuntu neebaasa kukorwa kandi egarukye ekorwe kurugiirira aha mbeera n'omugisha .
Enshonga eri aha n’okugira ngu obukomooko bw’omuntu tiburikuhamibwa buzima .

Akaba atungire amagoba ga miriyoni igana z'ebintu .
Bakeihaho buri omwe , enshonga n'okureeberera abaana baabo .

Empunu yaaguruka aha bibero byawe , n'ahabw'okuba ebibero byawe nibishuuma .
Abarikworoba baine kuba abahuuku .
Waba nokunda omuntu , omukunde n'omutima gwawe gwona .

Hariho ebintu bingi ebitushemerire kumanya tutakataahire omu bushwere .
Eki kikaba kikoresibwa munonga nk'eby'okweshemeza abantu kureeba .
Abarikuteekateekwaho kuza omu kooti baine kukyeberwa kureeba ngu baine embeera y'ebiteekateeko .
Miriyoni magana mukaaga niziija kuheebwayo omu kushashura .

Abarwaire abamwe bakahika aha kushoberwa ngu bakarugaho .
Ku beetomboitire , bakagambirwa ngu bashabe gavumenti kwongyera kutunga abakozi .
Abamwe abu barikukora nabo bakakyendeeza aha mushaara .
Hariho obuhame ngu ebihandiiko byahindurwa .
Ni mitwarize ki erikubaasa kutegyekwa abaserukare nk'abo ?
Ebicweka by'ebiragiro ebirikureetaho okubeihabeiha nibyo byonka ebirikuteebwa omu nkora .
Okushaba oku kugyendereire kutunguura oburuuru oburimu obugabe kandi oburingaaniza .
Ebingi ahari ebi bikaba biri eby’okushoroora n’okugumisiriza .
Okugumisiriza nikyo abantu barikwetenga .
Okutebekanisa oburuuru bw'obugabe n'oburingaaniza nikibaasa kureetaho obusingye n'obugwagye .
Oku ebyafaayo birikubaasa kwegarukamu .
Hashemerire kubaho omuringo gwokuzibira obutabanguko .
Mbaire ndi omu ofiisi egi emirundi mingi wiiki ehweire .
Abarikureebererwa bari omu mashomero , babiri bari aha Yunivasite .
Obundi enshoboorora emwe ahabw'okukyerererwa n'okutegyeka kubi .
Egesa yashohoza abantu abari enyima y'obushuma obu .
Embeera ya lockdown eriho hati ebaire egumire munonga .
Titurikwikirizibwa kuruga omu disiturikiti emwe kuza omu ndiijo .
Abavugi ba Boda Boda tibarikwikirizibwa kutwara omushabaazi weena .
Abakozi b'eby'amagara baine kugyendera aha bigyere kuza omu marwariro omu bwire obu .
Tikyanguhi abakazi b'enda kutambura omu marwariro .
Nangwa n'omu lockdown , twine kutwara abaana baitu kukyeberwa .
Emibazi y'okukyebera endwara neija kuba eriho wiiki erikwija .
Emibazi y'okukyebera neija kuheebwa abakaikuru/abagurusi bonka .
Abakozi b'eby'amagara n'abeegyesa nibaija kubanza batunga emibazi y'okukyebera .
Nikirungi kuba aha irwariro omu kasheeshe kare kutunga omubazi gw'okukyebera .
Omubazi gw'okukyebera tigurikwija kuheebwa abaana .
Ebikwekweto ebi bibiri ti byabaireho omurundi gumwe .
Gavumenti ezi zombi zigarukiremu kukoresa amaani kugaruraho empungi .
Eminyeeto neekirizibwa kutunga emibazi y'okukyebera .
Amarwariro gahweireho emibazi .
Ku baagambire kikaba kiri mpora kandi nikibuzabuza .
Aine kusherura omuntu ou arikujunaana .
Minisiture eshemerire kuha emibazi erikumara omu myanya y'amagara .
Ebitongore by'amagara biine kuha ripooti omu bwire omubazi gwaheza .

Abashaho b'omukicweka nabo bashemerire kuteekateekwaho ahabw'emirimo .
Ekitongore kiine wiiki emwe kushoborora enshonga eziri omu mbariirira .
Obukama tiburikwenda ngu enkora ibiri z'obugabe zikwataniise .
Buri omwe nayenda kuba ari omu bushoboorozi .
Hakabaho okurwanagana ahagati y'abavugi ba takisi n'abavugi ba minibaasi .
Abavugi ba takisi bangire kwongyeza emihendo y'entambura zaabo .

Amahe gakaikiriza engambo ezi .

Omukuru ogu agizire ngu abaserukare bana bonka nibo baitsirwe omukutaahirira oku .

Ebibira nibikora nka pampu z'amaizi omunsi yoona ezirikureeta enjura omubicweka bya hare .
Ensharamu nyingi z'enkora nizigaya ebi eby'obuhangwa birikuhwera abantu .
Ensharamu z'enkora nizigaya ebyetaago by'abantu abarikwegamira aha bibira ahabw'eby'okurya n'obugwagye .
Abantu nibatwara obuhangwa nk'eky'omuhendo ahabw'ebi burikukora omu bantu omu nsi yoona .
Obumwe obuhangwa nibureetaho obutaikirizana omu bantu .
Eby'obutegyeki nibikwata aha kutunga eby'obugaiga by'abantu n'oku obuhangwa burikurindwa .
Abategyeki nibahiga eby'obuhingi bingi kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'ensi yoona omu katare .
Emisiri empango neetaaha omu maka g'abantu kandi neetuurwamu enyamaishwa z'akabi nk'ebinyonyi ebikuru .
Abantu baine enteekateeka zitari zimwe na zimwe aha buhangwa kandi tikirikwetegyerezibwa aha bantu abamwe .

Omuriro gw'ebibira guhendaire abantu abarikugugyenderaho omu bwire obuhweire .

Okuhamya okujanjaaza ebiteekateeko by'eby'obutegyeki omu bwijwire .
Tiivi y'ebikwato ekaija yayeyongyera juba omu myaka ya makumi mushanju na makumi munaana .

Obushoboorozi bw'okuhindura omuhanda kubaasa kutunga enteekateeka endiijo .
Enkora y'emikutu ya intaneeti terikuha omugisha nk'ogwo .
Tihariho muhanda gw'okuhinduraho kutunga ekiteekateeko ekindi .
Eki nikibaho ahabw'ebirikuruga omu mikutu ya intaneeti .
Ku barikuheza kukingwa omu nkora egi , algorithms nizikora ekigyendererwa kyazo omu bwesherekye .
Akakiiko k'eby'empurizana aka Federo nikashaba ngu okuranga kwona okurikurangwa aha mpeho kumanyise orikukushashura .
Nitubaasa kutoorana omu bihandiiko ebihandiikirwe hamwe n'ebihandiikirwe aha mpeho ahabw'emyanya y'okuhandiika etari emwe n'emwe .
Ekicweka ky'okuhandiika eby'amakuru eky'obuhangwa nikireebeka gye orikushoma nari orikureeba .
Ekihama nk'ekyo n'okutegyeka amakuru nibikora aha bigyendererwa bitari bimwe na bimwe .
Ekishuba nikibaasa kuhika ahagati y'ensi amazima gatakatandikire .
Ebihandiiko ebigyendereirwe nibyetoorora ensi aha sipiidi y'enkuba .
Hati nitukora ki ?

Okugamba aha minyeeto ya Afirika erikukoresa esimu z'omu ngaro .

Niki obundi ekibaire kitarikwetegyerezibwa ?
Ekicweka kimwe n'ekibiina ky'okuteera akaruuru k'emizaano ekirikuguma nikikura omuri Afirika .
Ekikorwa ky'okuteera ebendera y'emizaano omu minyeeto ya Afirika kitwaire ekicweka eki omu bwire bw'omuyaga .
Okucondooza okuherize kukorwa hamwe na ripoota z'ebyafaayo nizooreka embeera mbi munonga , namunonga omu mahanga g'omu bukiizi-bwa-bumosho bwa Afirika .
Eminyeeto ya Afirika eri ahagati y'emyaka ikumi na mushanju kuhika ahari makumi ashatu n'etaano eyejumbire omu kuzaana zzaara .
Kenya , n'ebicweka makumi mushanju na bina ahari igana eby'okwejumba omu kuteera akaruuru k'emizaano .
Okucondooza okwakozirwe aha bantu nka enkumi ibiri na magana mushanju na makumi abiri na mukaaga aba Afirika ab'emyaka y'enkumi n'enkumi kukakorwa .
Ekikuru ekirikureetaho omuze ogu n'okujanjaara kw'amasimu g'omu ngaro buri hamwe .
Okwongyeraho ahari eki hariho okukwatanisa kwingi otwariremu n'okutunga satelayiti z'okureeba emipiira y'emizaano .
Okuteera ebendera y'emizaano kureetsireho oburemeezi bwingi aha minyeeto omu mahanga g'omu bukiizi-bwa-bumosho bwa Afirika .
Ahabw'okureeberera okw'aheeru n'okw'obwegyese .
Hariho okufa n'okuhutaara munonga ahabwa poriisi .
Ebitongore ebirikureeberera eby'obutegyeki nibireeba ngu abapooriisi abo baareebererwa omu mirimo yaabo eya buriijo .
Enteekateeka ezi nizitwariramu; okukyebera abakozi ba poriisi n'okugaruza busya puroguraamu ya poriisi omu kyanga .
Ekibiina ekirikukora aha kuhindura poriisi kikashagika bingi ahari ebi ebyabaire nibigyezaho kuhindura poriisi .
Abapooriisi baingi bagizire ngu batiinire kugamba ahabw'okutiina ebirugiremu .

Abapooriisi nibakira kukingirana baaba bari omu bushaarizi .

Winnie , noija kwikiriza kuba omwebembezi waitu aha bwa Purezidenti ?
Omukazi we Winnie Byanyima akatangaara munonga .
Kandi omu bwire bukye okugaaniira okwo kukaba kwongyera kuba okw’amaani .
Winnie akagira ati: "Nikibaasa kuba eky'okweita" .
Iwe noija kumutwara ota ?
Ninteekateeka ngu ni .

Kandi shi ekiraarugyemu ki ?
Ekihandiiko eki kikareetaho okwebaganisamu omu kitongore ky'okurwanisa eihanga .
Dr .  Besigye ajumiriire obutegyeki oburikwebemberwa Purezidenti Yoweri Museveni .

Nahabwekyo nimmanya gye okushemererwa oku Uganda yatungire .

Omubaro gw'abantu ogurikuteberezibwa omu mwaka makumi abiri na ikumi ni miriyooni z'abantu .
Hakaba hariho abateezi b'akaruuru baingi abahandiikirwe abari ahansi y'emyaka ikumi n'munaana .
Abateezi b'akaruuru abasya obukaikuru butaano nibareebeka nk'abatari b'amazima .
Omubaro oguhikire nigwija kutunga bwanyima yokwiha emizimu omu kitabo ky'abateezi b'akaruuru
Abantu baingi bakejumba omu karuuru akahwaire .
Abateezi b'akaruuru beeyongyeire munonga omwaka ogu .
Omu nkumi ibiri ikumi , okweyongyera kw'abateezi b'akaruuru kubaireho ahari igana ahari igana .
Omubaro gw'okuzaara gukaguma nigushushana kuruga omu kubara kw'abantu okwahererukireyo .
Ninteekateeka ngu abantu nibaija kwija kuteera akaruuru .
Hariho emiringo mingi y'okwerinda eteirweho .
Ebintu ebi nibyoreka ngu obutujju n'akabi aha bukuumi bw'ensi yoona .
Ebintu by‘obusaasi nibiija kwetantarwa abatebeekanisa baaba nibatwara enkora z‘okwerinda ez‘omutaano .
Ebindi eby'okwerinda harimu eby'okucondooza eby'ekyoma aha miryango y'okutaahamu kubaasa kureeba bbomu .
Buri omwe aine kumanya ebirikumukwataho obwire bwona .
Buri omwe ashemerire kufayo aha biriyo nibibaho omu kicweka kye .
Abantu tibashemerire kutiina ahabw'okuteerwa abatugi aba .
Twakora hamwe nitubaasa kusingura abatugi .
Nibakora sente kuruga omu sente z'okutoorana .
Nitwenda kuha ebirikukwata aha mbeera egi .
Minisita n'omushaija w'obwesigwa .
Okwesharinga kwaitu aha kugabanisa ebicweka by'obutegyeki kugaya .
Abantu bakaba bazibirwa kwehandikisa ahabw'okugira ngu n'abanyamahanga .
Okwesharinga kwaitu ahabw'ebikorwa ebi bibi tikusingwire .
Abamwe bakakwatwa aha nguuto kuhisya obu okutoorana kwahwaire .
Abesimbireho abatarikuhakanisibwa boona bakaruga omu kicweka kimwe .
Ruhanga aine embabazi nk’omukazi .
Kuruga omu karuuru ka ikumi na mwenda na makumi mwenda na mukaaga , hariho okweyongyera kw'abateezi b'akaruuru .
Obundi abantu abamwe tibarikubaasa kureeba okworeka abateezi b'akaruuru .

Eki nikigamba bingi aha bwengye obu turikuteekateeka aha bakuru .
Mbwenu shi ahabwenki mwajunaanwa ngu noyenda kumwita ?
Kuri noogira ngu nkaba nyejumba omu kumuteera amasasi , akaba naija kufa .
Okakora bizinesi n'omushaija ogwo ?
Ndi omushuubuzi , tindikwejumba omu by'obutegyeki .
Tindikwija kugaruka kwejumba omu mirimo y'amahe nari eby'obutegyeki .
Abaire aheirwe ebihembo birungi .
Abashaija bombi batwairwe nk'abarikuteekateekwaho .
Bakareeba okuteera amasasi nyomwebazyo .

Abaitsi bakaija omunju ebiro bikye enyima .

Etawuni yoona erimu ebipande bya kyenju .

Abantu n'abooro kandi nibakira kukunda kwijuza enda zaabo ahabw'ekiro .

Emirimo ekaba erimu okutendeka abantu omuby'obwegyese , okuhakana aha radiyo .
Ahabw'okutaikirizana oku , abantu nibakunda kuteera akaruuru ab'enganda zaabo .
Obutaikirizana omu nganda nibureetwa okurwanira eby'obugaiga bw'omutaka .
Gavumenti ekataho amagomborora n'ebicweka .
Gavumenti eine amatsiko ngu enganda zombi niziija kutunga abajwekyerwa barikwingana .
Abareeberezi nibagira ngu eki nikibaasa kuba eky'okureeberaho ky'okwebaganisamu kw'amaani .
Okuteera akaruuru okurugiirira aha nganda nikwanga abeebembezi abaine obujunaanizibwa bw'abateezi b'akaruuru .
Obwebembezi bubi n'okuha obuheereza nibireebeka omu disiturikiti .
Tukiri omu kihome ky'omushwija gw'ensiri .
Abantu nibafa ahabw'okubura obujanjabi .
Nibabaasa kutunga emibazi kuruga omu bitongore bya gavumenti eby'amagara .
Abantu nibafa buri izooba , n'obu endwara eraabe neebaasa kuzibirwa .
Amaizi maingi agagumire nigazaara ensiri .
Obukooko obu nibukunda kurya eshagama y'omuntu okukira enyamaishwa .
Abantu nibaija baaba nibamanya ngu hariho ebiconco .
Emirimo neehwera abantu kugira eki baakora omu nkora y‘okucwamu omu kyanga .
Eiriho ry'okutunga ofiisi z'eby'obutegyeki niryo ririkureetaho obutaikirizana .
Gavumenti ekaba neyenda kwongyera aha ofiisi z'eby'obutegyeki ahabw'enganda ibiri .
Okutambura oku nikubaasa kuhenda disiturikiti omu mwanya gw'okugikwatanisa .
Okufuuhirira nikukiraho .
Okuzibira nikwija waaba nooteganisa okutambura kw'okufuuhirira .
Okufuuhirira nikukora gye omu kucwekyereza omushwija gw'ensiri .
Emishango bwanyima ekagwa kuhika ahari makumi ashatu omu kwezi kwa mwenda kandi makumi abiri n'etaano omu kwezi kwa ikumi .
Emibazi ekaba neshusha ngu ekakora .
Amaju obukaikuru munaana gafuuhiriirwe omu disiturikiti munaana .
Abantu obukaikuru mukaaga bonka nibo barinzirwe .
Abantu baingi nibanga okufuuhirira amaka gaabo .
Abakazi bashemerire kuba baine haakiri ebicweka makumi ashatu ahari igana eby'ebicweka byona eby'okucwamu .
Eminyeeto n'abarema nabo baine omujwekyerwa omu ishengyero .
Abarikuhandiikwa omu mahe nibaruga omu bicweka byona eby'eihanga n'omu nganda zoona .
Ebitongore bya gavumenti nibiranga emigisha y'emirimo eriho kurabira omu kakiiko aka .
Ebigyezo nibitebeekanisibwa abahabuzi nari abashomesa ba yunivasite .
Abarikuhikiiriza ebirikwetengyesa bashemerire kutunga ebicweka ebiri ahaiguru ya makumi mushanju ahari igana omu bigyezo .
Enkora niyo emwe neekoresibwa omu kuha obuhwezi bw'okwega .
Okutoorana nikurugiirira aha bukuru beitu kutari aha nkoragana y'eby'obutegyeki .
Abashomesa bakaitwa nari bahunga omu ihanga .
Tikyabaire nikimara kugamba ngu “titugaruka” aha kwitwa kw’oruganda .
Obutegyeki bw'ebiragiro nibwo bwonka oburikubaasa kuhwera okukiza okwebaganisamu okubi .
Nibabaasa kukoresa emiteekateekyere y'okumanya oruganda kutunga obushoboorozi bw'eby'obutegyeki .
Ab'eby'obutegyeki abamwe buzima babaire nibajunanwa ebiteekateeko by'okwita abantu ahabw'oruganda .
Ab'eby'obutegyeki nibakora ebiteekateeko kandi bakora aha kubishomesa .
Bendiocarb neija kutandika kukoresibwa bwanyima y'okutendeka abahwezi b'eby'amagara .
Abakuru omuby'amagara bakagyezaho kuremesa ensiri kugira obuzibu bw'okurwanisa endwara egi .
Omushwija gw'ensiri nigwita abaana miriyooni emwe omunsi yoona buri mwaka .
Ebirugiremu bikaba nibiraganisa ahabwokuba endwara ekaba eri haihi kuhwaho .
Okumanyisa abantu munonga aha kwerinda omushwija gw'ensiri kukakorwa .
Ebirugire omu kucondooza nibituha obuhame aha nshonga ezirikubaasa kuba ziine oburemeezi omu muhanda .
Obukooko bw'omushwija gw'ensiri nibwetenga molekyu egi kubaasa kusingura omu kihangirwe ekirikugitunga .
Abanyasayansi nibaija kucondooza oku obukooko obu burikwejumba omu kuhindura eby'okurya omu mubiri .
Eki nikirugiirira ahari ripoota eyashohoziibwe omu jano .
Abantu obukaikuru magana abiri na makumi ana na mushanju bakakwatwa omushwija gw'ensiri .
Eki nikihamya ngu okuhandiika abantu omu mirimo ya gavumenti nikukorwa aha bukugu .
Kikaba kiri eky'okwikiriza ngu obutegyeki bw'ebiragiro nibwija kureetaho obusingye na demokuraasi .
Abashaija abarikukora ebintu nibareebeka nk'abarikumanya oburemeezi oburi omu maisho .
Nagira ngu eki nikireetera obutakora gye .
Nangwa n'abantu abahikire , emirimo terikwija kukorwa gye .
Twine kugira entandikwa nsya .
Ekitebyo ky'omunyabwengye nikiha ekishushani ekirikushemeza aha kworeka kwe .
Omurimo ogu gukamureetera obutagira eki arikukora obwire obwingi .
Ariyo naayoreka omworeka gwe gw'okubanza ogw'omuntu wenka .
Mbwenu shi okukunda nikushukwa omu kugaita erangi ?
Entebekanisa y'okuboneza emotoka neehwera omu kuguma emotoka eri omu mbeera nungi .
Ni buheereza ki obushemerire kukorwa kandi emirundi engahi ?
Amaduuka g'okuheereza emotoka gari omu bizinesi y'okukora sente .
Omuntu namanya ata obuheereza n'obwire ?
Emotoka ezikozesiibwe ziine kuba zirimu akatabo k'okuziboneza .
Guma noijuka obuheereza bwa buriijo obuhandiikirwe .
Emotoka ezirikuvugwa aha nguuto mbi nizetenga kubonezibwa emirundi mingi .
Okuboneza kushemerire kukorwa emirundi engahi ?
Nikibaasa kuhandiika obwire obu obuheereza obumwe bushemerire kukorwa .
Nikibaasa kworeka okuhindura amajuta okurikuza kukorwa ahari mailo enkumi itaano .
Ameezi mukaaga kuruga obu obuheereza bwahererukayo , amajuta gaine kuhindurwa .
Emiringo yoona ey'okureeberera eine kukorwa .
Emiringo y'obuheereza etari emwe n'emwe neetaanira kimwe kuruga aha motoka emwe kuza aha ndiijo .
Obuheereza obukuru nibukira kukorwa omu bwire bwa mailo enkumi makumi ashatu .
Emotoka ensya nizetenga obuheereza bukye kukira ezabandize .
Eby'okureeberaho bingi ebisya tibirikwetenga kuhindura ebiriisa .
Ebimwe aha mirimo y'okuboneza eya buriijo harimu okuhindura amajuta g'emotoka n'okushwijuma .
Emotoka ku erikuba etebekanisiibwe kuza omu buheereza okuhindura amajuta nikukorwa .
Ekitongore ky'obuheereza kiine kukora okukyebera okuhikire .
Emipiira na oburemeezi n'ebintu by'okwerinda ebitarikwetenga kubonezibwa buri kaanya .
Emipiira na oburemeezi biine kukyeberwa kandi bikahindurwa kyaba nikyetengyesa .
Ebikwato by'okusiimura , oku birikuteebwaho , n'emisipi y'okuvuga ingini biine kukyeberwa .
Ebizibu byaba bitafayo , ebizibu nibibaasa kushara omu bihimba by'ebizibu .
Ebizibu n’emipiira ebikuzire nibiija kuremesa emotoka kwemerera .
Emipiira ehweireho neekwata aha kuzibira .
Abantu barikuhika ikumi na babiri batunga obuhuta bw'amaani .
Okutaho enkora nsya nikiija kuba aha mutwe gw'enteekateeka .
Nikiija kumanyisa yaaba abashagiki nibaija kwijuza ekishaayi kubashagika .
Nikireebeka hariho enshonga n'embeera .
Egi niyo nshonga ahabwenki abakazi barikushemeza omu bishushani byabo .
Eki nikigiha okureebeka kw'obuhangwa .
Eki nikikyendeeza okurwanagana kw’okuvunuura obuhangwa obuhikire obw’ebishushani .
Eki kikamureetera kuza omu mbeera mbi y'ebishushani .
Ni buheereza ki obushemerire kukorwa aha motoka emwe ?
Akatabo aka nikabaasa kuteebwa omu kitabo kya mukama waakyo .
Eki nikiija kureetaho esente ezindi aha kuhunduuza .
Ebi bikaba biri ahabw'obuhwezi bw'esente kuruga aheeru y'ihanga .
Hariho okwebaganisamu aha bushoborozi bw’ebyahandiikirwe .
Abantu aba bakaba bataine by'okurwanisa .
Tindikumanya ahabw’enki baateirwe .
Okucondooza kwaitu nikugumizamu .
Ab'eby'obutegyeki baitu nibatwara ebiconco aha bateezi baabo b'akaruuru .
Eki nikyo kiri eky'akabi munonga eky'obushomankuzi .
Ebikorwa ebi nibiruga omu mitwarize y'abantu baitu .
Abantu ba buriijo tibaine ki barikugamba aha nkora y'eby'obutegyeki .
Omuhinduzi akaba naza kukyendeeza aha migisha y'abanyabwengye .
Okuba ekicweka ky'abantu ekirikukirayo kugamba n'eiraka rihango .
Nibarwanirira obugabe bwabo omu rurimi rw'obugabe .
Omuhinduzi tarikubaasa kuteerana abantu ba buriijo ahabwokuba tibarikumanya kushoma n'okuhandiika .
Tibarikugamba aha radiyo , tiivi nari kuhandiika omu mpapura z'amakuru .
Kuri noogira ngu abahakani nibabaasa kutebeekanisa abantu ba buriijo abarikubonabona ahabw'okuhemurwa .
Nitumanya eki abahakani barikurwanisa , beitu kutari eki barikwemerera .
Obushagiki oburikuhindura omuzaano niburuga omu bicweka ebitebeekanisiibwe .
Eki kireeteire baingi kwebuuza ngu okwikiriza kwa Anglican nikutwara muhanda ki .
Gavumenti eshemerire kwehayo kucondooza aha bigambo ebi .
Bakaihaho ameino baashara ente .
Eki kikabaho kuruga obu gavumenti yaatandikaho “entebeekanisa y’okubinga eby’okurwanisa” .
Omurimo gw'okubinga eby'okurwanisa nigwija kuba ekiroto ky'obugabe bw'abantu .
Eki nikyoreka ngu tibarikumanya rwango n'obusaasi .
Ebizibu nk'okugira eitaka , obujanjabi bubi , n'obwegyese bikiriho .
Nikyo kyonka yaaba naabaasa kukorwa kugaruka ahansi kuhika ahari makumi mushanju ahari igana omu burengyerwa-izooba .
Kureka yaakora enkora y'okuhindura omuzaano omu bicweka byona .
Empindahinduka y'okurinda kwonka ti mpinduka y'omutaano omu by'obutegyeki bwaitu .
Ebi nibibabaasisa kukwata abantu baingi .
Nibabaha obuconco bukye nk'okushashura ebishare n'ebishare by'obujanjabi .
Nibatwara ekitiinisa kingi okworeka embabazi z’omuntu .
Baine eiraka rikye omuri kyo .
Nibatunga okusaasirwa omu bibiina by'obugabe bw'abantu n'eby'obuhwezi omu nsi yoona .
Eki nikiija n’okugira ngu “obugabe bw’abantu” nibukorwa abakuru .
Enkora endiijo ey'okukuratira enteekateeka ya demokuraasi neekomooka aha kusherura oburingaaniza omu bantu .
Okushaba ebintu nk'ebishare n'emirimo aha bizibu byabo ebi barikugaaniiraho .
Niyo nshonga ahabwenki turiyo nitureeba okurwanagana ahabw’okutunga “eby’okunyaga omu ofiisi” .
Ekyo nikibabaasisa kukwata abantu baingi .
Tihariho kicweka ky'eihanga ekirahonokirweho .
Kandi bateera amasasi aha bantu ba buriijo .
Bakaba bataine by'okurwanisa kandi barikugyendera omu busingye n'ente zaabo .
Hariho oburemeezi bw'ebyobutegyeki omu ihanga oburikwetenga kushoboororwa .
Kishiisire obugabe bwaitu kandi twine kubugarura .
Twine amatsiko ngu kitakakyeire munonga .
Teekateeka ahari ba minisita bashatu kuza omu paramenti kushohora n'ebigambo bishatu aha nshonga emwe ?
Empindahinduka ezo , enkora n'ebiragiro bikateebwaho .
Gavumenti ekagira ngu bakama b'ebyombeko bya boona babe baine eby'okucondooza eby'ekyoma .
Eki kikaha gavumenti omuhanda gw'okureeberera eby'empurizana byabo omu mateeka .
Ebikwato ebirikucondooza eby'ekyoma hati biri buri hamwe omu rurembo kandi tibirikushashurwa omushoro .
Ekizibu eki n'omutwe ogurikugarukagaruka omu gavumenti .
Obukiiko bw'ebyanga oburikukira obwingi nibubonabona ahabw'oburemeezi bw'okwesiga .
Empindahinduka ezi aha rurengo rw'eihanga n'orw'ebyanga niziija kukoresibwa zita omu kurwanisa obutujju ?
Enkora zoona ezirikubaasika nizikorwa aha rurengo rwa gavumenti .
Okuta omutima aha bantu nikyo ky'okurwanisa ekihikire eky'okurwanisa obutiini .
Omu muringo ogu , ebyanga nibibaasa kumanya abatuuzi abatari mu mateeka n'abarikuteekateekwaho kuba abakozi b'ebibi .
Eky'okugarukamu kiri omu kureeberera kw'abantu boona kuhitsya obu turabaase kukoresa kamera n'ebirikukuratira .
Omurimo gwa kanso z‘ebyanga omu kyanga n‘okugaruzaho obupooriisi aha nshonga
Okutongoza kukaba kushemerire kuba okw'omutaano .
Omwebembezi w'oruteerane oru akaba aine kutooranwa abantu .
Orukiiko oru rushemerire kumanyisa enkoragana y'ebibiina by'obutegyeki .
Baingi bakabuuza yaaba hariho omugasho gw'ebibiina ebiri omu rubaju oruhakani .
Ebibiina by'obutegyeki bigumisiriize ebizibu ebi orukiiko rwabaire rugyendereire kwemereza .
Abahakani bareebire okutuntuzibwa kubi kuruga omu Ihanga .
Abakuru omukibiina ekirikuhakanisa gavumenti nibazibirwa obwire aha mikutu y'amakuru eya gavumenti .
Nibateekateeka ngu tikihikire kandi nikishagika ekibiina ekiri omu butegyeki .
Hariho ekyetengo ky'okutegyeka ebibiina by'obutegyeki omu ihanga omu mateeka .
Obundi bwanyima y'okuteera akaruuru , nitwija kubaasa kureeba empindahinduka ezimwe .
Ekibiina ekiine kwebembera orukiiko oru nikitwara emyanya egumire .
Ekibi munonga , omwebembezi akaba atariho .
Bakebuuza ahari ba looya baabo n'abantu boona .
Okwetwa kukaheebwayo ira munonga kwonka kukaba kutakaheebwaga kitiinisa .
Gavumenti eshemerire kushoborora ebitahikire ebirikwetooroora oburuuru .
Kikaba nikiza kuba eky'oburemeezi .
Bakama b'ebyombeko bya boona bashemerire kukora okucondooza aha mitumbi n'emotoka .
Emirimo egi ey'obupooriisi neerimu okuhandikisa abatuuragye b'ebyaro bya Local Council .
Pooriisi ebabinga obugabe bw'okwesharinga omu bwengye .
Akaiguraho omwanya gw'eby'obutegyeki ngu beejumbemu .
Orukiiko oru nirwija kugamba aha nshonga ezirikuteganisa ebibiina by'obutegyeki .
Bakeeta abanyamakuru kubahereeza kuza kubugana abeebembezi abarikutegyeka .
Ahindwire aha biteekateeko bye ahari ekyo .
Tihariho nshonga erikworeka gye ahabwenki eki .
Abantu aba akeeta ababeihi .
Okujumwa okwo nikuhurirwa nk'okw'okutangaaza .
Ebibiina nibishashura omuhendo gw'okureeberera kwabyo aha nshonga nkuru .
Orukiiko tirurugiremu bingi .
Abakuru b'ekibiina ekisya bakagyendera omu ruguuto baine emikono ahaiguru y'emitwe .
Omukoro ogu gukaba guri entandikwa y'ekibiina ekisya .
Tihariho oshemerire kuta ahansi okwehayo kwaitu ahari demokuraasi .
Omuntu weena ku araateho obutegyeki bw'ekinyamahe , nibaija kumurwanisa .
Okushoroora abantu nikiija kurekura amaani gaabo agatarikureebwa .
Ebyanga biine kusheenya ekizibu kyona ekirikuzibira demokuraasi .
Omuntu weena ku araatuhe omugisha gw'okurwana orutaro oruhikire , ekyo nikiija kuba kiri ahariwe .
Akarabura aha kurahuka kuhandiika abantu nk'abazigu .
Abantu abatahikire baine kushohozibwa okwetantara okushiisha abandi .
Ekibiina kishemerire kutaho ebiragiro by'emitwarize .
Tihariho nshonga y'amaani ey'eby'obutegyeki .
Nikiha abooro omugisha gw'okutunguura embeera zaabo .
Omuntu wa bizinesi nawe n'omukozi .
Okuhakanisa kw'obuntu n'amaani maingi .
Orukiiko rukaba rugyendereire kushoboorora ebizibu byona ebyabaire bitakashoboroirwe .
Orukiiko rukaba rutashangire mugasho gwona omu bigambo ebyo .
Abarikukoragana baine kutwara obutaikirizana nk'eishomo .
Amaani g'obugabe bw'eihanga nigabaasa kwongyera aha butaikirizana nk'obwo .
Akakurura abantu baingi munonga buri kuzayo .
Tihariho kibi ekirimu .
Emirimo mingi eyabaire eine kukorwa ekaba ekozirwe .
Ogu murundi n'omurundi gwabo kwebembera ekibiina .
Ebibiina byombi bikataho abesimbireho omukaruuru aka .
Tihariho oshemerire kushobya okwehayo kwaitu .
Abazigu baine kurwanisibwa , nangwa n'amasasi .
Abantu buntu bakaba nibashoborokyerwa gye kandi baine obugabe bw'okutwara emyanya omu kibiina .
Otakaikiriza omuntu weena kukubuzabuza aha nshonga egi .
Niki ekirikubaasa kubaho baaba nibasinga bakaija omu butegyeki ?
Na hati bari aharubaju oruhakani .
Yaheza kushutama .
Omushuma aragiire viinyo y'obuguzi bukye munonga .
Omushaija taragiire n'okubiika emeeza egyo .
Ariyo nateera esimu ye arikuteera esimu ezo ez'abanyabwengye .
Noomanya eki ndikugambaho ​​.
Ahwehura n'eiraka rihango , arikweshushaniriza ngu noobaasa kuhurira .
Naagamba munonga .
Abashaija b'emiringo egi nibateganisa .
Omuntu , ninkushaba ongambire eki n'enki ?
Nkakwatwaho munonga ahabw'obushema bwe .
Omushaija ariyo nayebuuza ahu naaza .
Ni omushema munonga kuteekateeka ngu nimbaasa kugaruka kugamba nawe .
Tinyine kwefuuza ahabw'okurugayo ntariire kyakiro .
Ni ensi y'amazima , ti nsi nkye eyahangirwe omunyabwengye ogu .
Nyinakuru akagira ati , “ amaani g’omushaija omu mitwarize ye . ”
Abareeberezi bakaba baine okubanganisa aha kishushani ekirikugamba ebigambo rukumi .
Abakazi nibooreka ekiniga kyabo ahabw'okutuntuzibwa .
Ebishushani nibyoreka obusaasi obu abakazi barikurabamu omu bwire bw'entaro z'eby'okurwanisa .
Obutumwa n'okurekyera aho okutuntuza abakazi n'abaishiki .
Ebishushani makumi ashatu bikakora ebicweka bitaano eby'omworeka .
Kikayoreka obukoryo obuteirweho kushoboorora enshonga egi .
Iwe tofayo aha kutoroboza abakazi ?
Obukaikuru n'obukaikuru bw'abakazi nibatunga obutabanguko omu maka gaabo .
Obutabanguko aha bakazi n'abaishiki nibutwara emiringo etari emwe n'emwe .
Nikikwata aha bakazi omu mitendekyere yoona ey'amagara gaabo .
Abakazi abarikurenga obukaikuru magana abiri babonabonesiibwe ahabw'okutorobozibwa omu by'okuteerana .
Bakakozesa obukoryo bw'okuteera ebishushani kumanyisa abantu obutabanguko obu .
Omworeka ogu nigutaahirira obutabanguko oburikukorwa aha bakazi .
Obutabanguko nibubaho omu maka , omu mashomero , omu myanya y'okukoreramu , n'omu byaro .
Ebikwato by'okusiimura endabirwamu n'ebintu bikuru omu kuvuga .
Abasiimura endabirwamu z'omumaisho baine ekiponji .
Ebimwe aha bikwato by'okusiimura nibisiimura kubi byateebwa omu kugyezibwa .
Abandi nibetenga kugarurwaho ahabw'okuba nibajwara kandi nibasheeshasheesha .
Ebisiimura by'endabirwamu byaremwa kusiimura , bihindure .
Oine kuzihindura buri myezi mukaaga kubaasa kukora gye .
Ku biraabe bitahindukire , ebintu byona eby'okusiimura endabirwamu nibiija kufa ahabw'embeera y'obwire .
Okukwatwa omushana gw'eizooba n'okushiisha empeho nikireetera orupiira kukura .
Nibabaasa kugira obushaarizi obutahwaho .
Eki nikibaho munonga aha motoka ezipakiire aheeru omu mushana ogurikwotsya eizooba ryona .
Eizooba niriteeka kandi rigumizamu orupiira .
Okukozesa munonga nikubaasa kuguma aha bikwato by'okusiimura .
Ekibunu kyaba nikifeerwa omukono gwakyo , amaizi nigaza ahansi yaakyo kandi gaguma aha giraasi .
Ekirugiremu n'okukyendeera omu kureeba n'okusiimura kubi .
Ekyoma kyona ekitarikukora gye omu kusiimura nikyetengyesa kuhindurwa .
Ekibunu kyona ekiine obuzibu kiine kugarurwaho .
Okukyebera okwanguhi n'okugyezaho eby'okwozya endabirwamu aha izooba ry'okwoma .
Reeba n'omuringo gw'okwozya endabirwamu .
Abantu bombi nibakorera hamwe ?
Reeba ngu ekifuuhi kyateera endabirwamu ahu kishemerire .
Omuhandiiki naija kukunda kutunga ebiteekateeko bimwe .
Ebiragiro nibihakanisa n'ekikorwa ky'okuteera ebitabo n'okujanjaaza ebihandiiko by'obugomi .
Okwesharinga oku kutunguukire okuteisa aha rurengo rwahaiguru .
Embundu zonka tizirikubaasa kurwanisa obutujju .
Viinyo egyo ekakorwa omu ihanga ki ?

Abakazi n'abashaija bashemereire kugira emigisha erikwingana n'obugabe omu kyanga .
Akasinga akaruuru k'okujwekyera purezidenti w'ekibiina ky'eby'obutegyeki .
Obusinguzi bwe bukagarurwa enyima ahabw'okugira ngu oburuuru bukaba buri obw'obushuma .
Abamwe omubataka nibenda ngu aihwe omu ntebe ya meeya .
Ekibiina ekirikuhakanisa gavumenti tikiine sente z'okuhakanisa oburuuru .
Yahamya ngu kooti nemushanga aine omushango gw'okwita .
Omushwija gw'ensiri omu bakazi b'enda nigubaasa kureetera enda kuruga omunda .
Abakazi b'enda bashemerire kubyama ahansi y'obutimba bw'ensiri kandi bakatunga obujanjabi baaba barwaire .
Enjuma ezomire nizimara obwire buraingwa niyo nshonga ahabwenki abaguzi baingi nibazikunda .
Kampuni neeguza ebipande by’ekyoma eby’omutindo gw’ahaiguru .
Abantu abamwe nibatwazibwa kubi kandi nibanyigirizibwa omu ihanga eri .
Amahe gakataahirira kandi gaita abantu baingi abatariho rubanja okwezi okuhwaire .
Abakuru ba gavumenti abamwe bagambirweho okutwara ebituga .
Hariho emishango mingi y'obushuma omu kitongore ekyo .
N'omwebembezi w'amaani munonga kandi orikubaasa .
Abamwe abesimbireho aha ntebe y'obwa purezidenti barugire omu karuuru k'okumushagika .
Kampeyini ku zaaherize kuhwa , akaba atakiine matsiko goona g'okusinga akaruuru .
Nitushwijuma emirimo ye omu kampeyini .
Gavumenti eshemerire kutaho sente nyingi ahabw'ekitongore ekirikurwanisa oburi bwenguzi .
Ekitongore tikiine sente z'okuhwera abakozi baakyo omu mirimo yaabo .
Gavumenti yashohoza sente z'okwombeka eikorero risya ry'amashanyarazi .
Kampuni ezi zombi zikwataniise kukora hamwe aha purojekiti ensya .
Amashanyarazi aga masya nigaija kureeta amashanyarazi maingi omu ihanga .
Ekishaayi ky'enyonyi kikarekyera aho kukora emyaka ikumi enyima .

Pooriisi eyangire kuruga omuka ye .
Niwe mwebembezi w'ekibiina ekirikuhakanisa gavumenti omu ihanga .
Kooti eragiire abapooriisi kugaruka omu nkambi zaabo .
Abapooriisi baingi babaire beehinguririize eka ye omukasheeshe aka .
Abataka baingi batandikire kutaho bizinesi nkye kureeberera amaka gaabo .

Akaza omu ihanga erihereire aha mukoro ogu .
Abamwe aha bantu abarikutuura omu byaro tibarikubaasa kutunga ebyetaago nk'eby'okurya .
Nitubiika esente zaitu omwaka gwona kandi nitubaasa kuzitunga omu kwezi kwa ikumi n'ebiri kwonka .
Abamwe omubantu bateireho ebibiina by'okubiika sente omunda yaabo ahabw'okuba banka ziri hare .
Yaheebwayo omu maisho g'omuramuzi omu ihangwe eri .
Nkamara eshaaha mukaaga ndikureeba ebyabaire nibibaho omu kooti .
Akatuha ebicweka by'orugyendo rwe .
Abashuubuzi abaingi nibakunda kugura ebintu byabo kuruga aheeru y'ihanga .
Eihanga riine eibanja rihango ry'okushashura .
Oburambuzi n'emwe aha mirimo erikweyongyera juba omu ihanga .
Akahindura aha biteekateeko bye aha kuhuumura aha by'obutegyeki .
Abamwe omubantu bakamutoorana kuba ceyamaani w'ekyanga .
Tahikiriize eki yaraganiise abateezi b'akaruuru be .
Akeetwa omu kooti ahabw'okutaahirira oku tiimu ye yakozire aha bantu b'omukicweka .
Tarabaasize kuza omu rukiiko ahabwokuba arwaire .
Abasinzi abamwe nibahwa ekiniga bateera abakazi baabo omuka .

Abantu b'omu kicweka ekyo nibashara aboojo bato nk'ekicweka ky'obuhangwa bwabo .
Akakiiko k'obugyenyi kakaba nikenda kumanya oku yaakoreise sente ezo omu by'okurya .
Abeebembezi b'eishomero eri bateireho miriyooni makumi abiri z'esente z'okuhwera ekiro ky'emizaano buri mwaka .
Manegya waitu akaha ripooti ngufu ahari kampuni ahari abashagiki omurukiiko .
Ogwo mugabuzi akagumizamu arikugira ngu taratungire sente kuruga ahari kasitoma .

Omushoro gwangye ningukoresa omu kupangisa n'eby'okurya .
Abantu abamwe nibetomboita ngu gavumenti terikushagika kiraabu z'omupiira z'omu ihanga .
Esente ezimwe tukazikozesa kushashura omutebekanisa w'eby'okurya aha bugyenyi bwaitu .

Abamwe aha bantu tibakatungire sente ezi gavumenti ebaraganiise kubaha .

Taata akatwarwa omu karantiini ngu atajanjaaza ab'omu ka yoona .

Navuga emotoka ye kuza aha murimo buri izooba .

Taata naguza enyama y'embuzi omu katare .
Akashaaruura emiyembe yoona ehiire kuruga aha muti .
Abahingi bariyo nibashaaruura ebihimba kuruga omu misiri yaabo .
Okuhinga ebihimba kukye kukareetwa ekihoora ky'obwire buraingwa .
